programme.title: Сумасшедшая свадьба
programme.desc: Директор районного краеведческого музея Василий Середюк, отправляя дочь Катю во Францию на учебу, не ожидал такого поворота – месяц назад она сообщила, что выходит замуж за французского врача – кардиохирурга Франсуа. Середюки – европейская семья! – этот лозунг услышал в районе каждый лично от Василия. Каково же было его удивление, когда он увидел, что желанный европейский зять – афрофранцуз. Организовать свадьбу так, чтобы она не состоялась, – кажется прекрасной идеей. Но когда на пути стоит настоящая любовь – неизвестно, удастся ли такой план реализовать.

programme.title: Улицы разбитых фонарей
programme.desc: Каждый новый день — новое преступление. За каждым углом поджидает опасность. Главный козырь бандитов в бескомпромиссной криминальной бойне — страх обывателей. Единственные, кто может бросить вызов преступникам — лишенные страха менты. Безупречная четверка вновь оказывается на грани. Каждый новый день — новый бой против бандитов.

programme.title: Улицы разбитых фонарей
programme.desc: Каждый новый день — новое преступление. За каждым углом поджидает опасность. Главный козырь бандитов в бескомпромиссной криминальной бойне — страх обывателей. programme.title: Интерны
programme.desc: Главные герои ситкома — интерны. Они все время попадают в идиотские ситуации, а их руководитель доктор Быков с удовольствием за этим наблюдает.

programme.title: Давай разведемся!
programme.desc: Это жизненные истории о некогда счастливых супружеских парах, которые принимают мучительное и тяжелое решение развестись. Суд в режиме реального времени разбирает семейные дела, находит объективную правду и решает, на чьей она стороне.

programme.title: Давай разведемся!
programme.desc: Это жизненные истории о некогда счастливых супружеских парах, которые принимают мучительное и тяжелое решение развестись. Суд в режиме реального времени разбирает семейные дела, находит объективную правду и решает, на чьей она стороне.

programme.title: Comedy Club
programme.desc: Они выходят на небольшой пятачок сцены прямо из зрительного зала, по пути перебрасываясь словечками с окружающими, делая комплименты, прося прикурить. Они не признают никаких авторитетов, приличий и правил. Они запросто могут осмеять любую звездную персону — даже если она сидит в зале. Они — часть своей аудитории, они живут такими же интересами. Их цель — завести публику, а не выступить, отыграв заученную программу.

programme.title: Улётный экипаж
programme.desc: "Девушка за штурвалом самолёта — что может быть хуже?", — думал пилот Лёша Кулагин, пока его страхи не оправдались. С помощью шантажа умница, красавица и лучшая в лётном училище Полина Овечкина уговаривает упрямого грубияна бросить грузовые самолёты, возглавить гражданский экипаж и взять её вторым пилотом. Просто Кулагин — единственный шанс Полины, наконец-то, отточить теоретические знания на практике. Ведь лётчики авиакомпании "Восторг Авиа" не готовы делить самолёт хоть и с профессионалом, но на каблуках. Пока она пытается подружиться с новым коллегой, Кулагин строит коварные планы, чтобы вернуть ненавистную соседку на землю.

programme.title: Кто в доме хозяин? 2
programme.desc: Молодой провинциал Никита Воронин приезжает в Москву, Он приехал не один, а с дочкой. Ребенку необходимы хорошие условия — не поселишься вместе с гастарбайтерами в общаге на пяти квадратных метрах! Никита устраивается помощником по хозяйству в дом преуспевающей бизнес-леди Дарьи Пироговой. Там же, у Дарьи в квартире, новоиспеченные москвичи и поселились

programme.title: Тайна Коко
programme.desc: 12-летний Мигель живёт в мексиканской деревушке в семье сапожников и тайно мечтает стать музыкантом. Тайно — потому что в его семейном клане музыка считается проклятием. Когда-то его прапрадед оставил свою жену, прапрабабку Мигеля, ради мечты, которая теперь не даёт спокойно жить Мигелю. С тех пор музыкальная тема в семье стала табу. Мигель обнаруживает, что между ним и его любимым певцом Эрнесто де ла Крусом, ныне покойным, существует некая — пока неназванная — связь. Паренёк отправляется к своему кумиру в Страну Мёртвых, где встречает души своих предков. Мигель знакомится там с духом-трикстером по имени Гектор (в облике скелета), который становится его проводником. Вдвоём они отправляются на поиски де ла Круса.

programme.title: Перси Джексон и похититель молний
programme.desc: Главный персонаж — мальчик, узнавший, что его отец — греческий бог. В сопровождении сатира и дочери Афины он отправляется в опасное путешествие, чтобы примирить богов.

2012 год. Наша планета находится на грани гибели. По расчетам ученых мощнейшие землетрясения, и вызванные ими цунами, уничтожат практически все, что создано человечеством. Спастись можно, только попав на специально построенные Ковчеги у подножья Эвереста. Но созданы они лишь для сильных мира сего, и билетов на них просто не достать. Кроме того, в условиях начинающейся паники, добраться до них повезет далеко не каждому, кто имеет этот билет. Человечество гибнет, сохраняя лишь малую толику своего наследия.

programme.title: Rizzoli & Isles
programme.desc: Meet an extraordinary pair- Jane Rizzoli, a Boston detective in the Homicide Unit and Dr. Maura Isles, the Commonwealth of Massachusetts' Chief Medical Examiner. They make a great team despite their differences and together with their colleagues, these two women put themselves in dangerous situations on a daily basis, solving various difficult cases, fighting crime and catching killers in this thrilling series inspired by the Maura Isles/Jane Rizzoli series of novels by an author Tess Gerritsen.

programme.title: Blindspot
programme.desc: 'Jane', who it is revealed, is a former Navy Seal, is bilingual and well trained in combat. She knows how to carry a weapon and to kill another person- what she doesn't know is who she is, or why she was found naked inside a bag, in New York Times Square. Kurt Weller, (Sullivan Stapleton), is the FBI special agent at the heart of the investigation into Jane, who's numerous tattoos covering the entirety of her body, actually make up a map of which indicate future crimes that have yet to unfold. Together, and armed with a team of FBI agents, Edgar Reade, Natasha Zapata and Patterson, they must translate Jane's tattoos in order to solve the crimes before they occur.

programme.title: Inspector Rex
programme.desc: On the streets of Vienna there's a new Kommissar, Kommissar Rex. After Rex's handler is killed, Richie Moser, newly divorced, finds himself drawn to Rex and breaks him out of the police center. And the new partnership is born. Rex uses his abilities to help track down the criminals and protect the innocent – and prevent his handler from falling in love. After Moser is killed in the line of duty (Season 4 : Ep 4), a reluctant Rex gets another new partner, Alex Brandtner. In Season 8, Marc Hoffmann is now Rex's partner, and he works along side Niki Herzog. Season 11 sees Rex relocated to Rome, Italy and he now has a new partner. Rex: During the series Rex was played by two different dogs.

programme.title: Burn Notice
programme.desc: Secret Agent Michael Westen has received a "burn notice". He is no longer considered trustworthy and loses his property and his papers. Without money, support or references, he lands in his hometown of Miami. Here he uses his experience as an agent to establish a new private investigator and find out who is responsible for his burn notice.

programme.title: Burn Notice
programme.desc: Secret Agent Michael Westen has received a "burn notice". He is no longer considered trustworthy and loses his property and his papers. Without money, support or references, he lands in his hometown of Miami. Here he uses his experience as an agent to establish a new private investigator and find out who is responsible for his burn notice.

programme.title: The Americans
programme.desc: The Americans is a spy drama series about a seemingly typical American married couple, Philip and Elizabeth Jenkins, who live with their two children, Paige and Henry, in a Washington D.C. suburb in the eighties. As it turns out the couple are actually Russian KGB officers on a Cold War mission, trained to pose as Americans. Other than following the assignments they get, the show also explores the relationship between the two.

programme.title: Manifest
programme.desc: On an unassuming flight from Jamaica to New York, Montego Air Flight 828 hits a patch of brief, terrifying turbulence. When the 191 passengers and crew members land at New York, they're told five and a half years have passed while they were airborne. Presumed dead by the world, the passengers struggle to come to terms with their existence as relatives and loved ones are not as they were before, and experience uncontrollable hallucinations and premonitions. This thrilling supernatural drama series is full of unexpected twists, as those involved unravel the unsettling mystery behind their presumed deaths.

programme.title: Riding in Cars with Boys
programme.desc: A single mother, with dreams of becoming a writer, has a son at the age of 15 in 1965, and goes through a failed marriage with the drug-addicted father.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: Criminal Minds shows everyday life of an elite team of special agents who work in the FBI's Behavioral Analysis Unit. They are trained to analyse line of thinking of criminals and foretell their next step and so prevent evil from happening. These specialists come to the rescue when all forces of police are engaged but the criminal is not detected. The agents use their unbelievable psychological methods, make themselves think like a criminal, analyse their characters and personalities.

programme.title: Hot in Cleveland
programme.desc: American sitcom. Melanie, Joy and Victoria are three friends from Los Angeles who find themselves making an unplanned stop in the City of Cleveland. When they discover that life in Ohio is a world away from the LA-existence that they've just left behind in California, these three feisty females decide to stay. Taken with this new-found city, they rent a house from an elderly caretaker named Elka. This comedy series is about getting older, dealing with the past, dating, relationships, dilemmas and friendship. Starring Valerie Bertinelli, Jane Leeves, Wendie Malick and Betty White.

programme.title: Dr. Ken
programme.desc: American sitcom starring Ken Jeong. Meet Dr Ken Park – he's a general practitioner with a wonderful wife and two bright kids. Dr Ken might seem to have it all – but what he lacks is tact, humility and consideration for others. The straight-talking Ken jokes his way through his personal and professional life as he tries to balance the two. Also starring Suzy Nakamura, Tisha Campbell and Jonathan Slavin.

programme.title: Kevin Can Wait
programme.desc: Kevin Can Wait is an American comedy series starring Kevin James as Kevin Gable, a police officer who finally retires. He has a whole retirement plan developed, hoping for a carefree life from now on, spent in fun activities with his fellow retired friends. But his family life ruins it all. It turns out that being at home with his wife and three children ain't so easy. His pension paycheck is too small, so he has to continue doing different jobs to support his family. With hypochondriac son Jack, daughter Sara with anger management issues, and eldest daughter Kendra quitting college and wanting to marry, things go a lot different than he imagined.

programme.title: Younger
programme.desc: Younger is an amazing combination of comedy, drama and romance, following Liza, a 40-year old woman who pretends to be much younger in order to get a dream job. She says she is 26 and gets a job she has wanted so much. She finds herself in the highly competitive world of publishing and now has to balance her real life and her made up one, with new friends and colleagues. Is it possible for a divorced mother to reinvent her life and manage her career and private life pretending to be someone much younger?

programme.title: The Nanny
programme.desc: Fran Fine, a fashionista and make-up saleswoman, shows up on the doorstep of the Sheffield family and becomes the nanny to Maggie, Brighton, and Grace, the children of British Broadway producer Maxwell Sheffield. The householf is managed by the acerbic butler Niles, who supports Fran, and often visited by Maxwell's business partner C.C. Babcock, who is determined to undermine her, as she sees Maxwell's attraction to Fran but is interested in him herself.

programme.title: Seinfeld
programme.desc: Jerry Seinfeld a neurotic New York stand-up comedian is the main character in this show about nothing, filled with many complex plots and sub-plots. Jerry and his friends (best friend George Costanza, former girlfriend Elaine Benes) are going through everyday life, discussing various situations and their eccentric personalities are not always helping them out.

programme.title: Mom
programme.desc: American sitcom about Christy, a single mother-of-two in recovery. Even after years of being sober, she is struggling with her addictions. She tries to stay positive but she is pushed to her limits when her mother, also a recovering alcoholic, returns back into her life. Together, this troubled daughter/mother duo try to rebuild their relationship and support each other to stay clean. The quarrels with her boss, teenage daughter and ex-husband do not make Christy's life any easier either. This comedy series deals not only with issues of addiction but a number of important topics in society including teen pregnancy, homelessness, domestic violence and death. Starring Anna Faris and Allison Janney as Christy and Bonnie Plunkett.

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Captivating American sitcom that follows the lives of Ted Mosby and his friends- a long-lasting couple Marshall Eriksen and Lily Aldrin, womanizer Barney Stinson, and news reporter and Ted's love interest Robin Scherbatsky, who all live in New York City. The story starts in 2030 as Ted tells his children the story of how he meet their mother, and goes back to 2005 when Ted started his quest of finding true love and the ''one'' for him. During his journey, he and his friends will have lots of funny, sad, unexpected and otrageous escapades.

programme.title: As Good as It Gets
programme.desc: A single mother and waitress, a misanthropic author, and a gay artist form an unlikely friendship after the artist is assaulted in a robbery.

programme.title: Baltā princese
programme.desc: Šī stāsta pamatā ir Filipas Gregorijas romāns ar tādu pašu nosaukumu, un tas ir stāsts par Jorkas Elizabeti, kura ir spiesta laulāties ar karali Henriju VII.

programme.title: Ielasmeitas
programme.desc: Iespaidīgs drāmas seriāls, kura darbība noris dzīvīgajā 18. gadsimta Londonā. Jauns un drosmīgs skatījums par pilsētas visvērtīgāko komerciālo darbību — seksu.

programme.title: Kāda jauna ārsta piezīmes
programme.desc: Šīs komēdijas-drāmas galvenie varoņi ir Džons Hems un Daniels Redklifs. Šī sāji smieklīgā filma ir par jauna ārsta karjeras uzsākšanu kādā mazā un atpalikušā Krievijas ciemā.

programme.title: Projekts "Zilā grāmata"
programme.desc: Astrofiziķis Dr. J Alens Haineks ir pieņemts darbā kādā slepenā programmā kopā ar kapteini Maiklu Kvinnu. Viņš pamazām saprot, ka atrodas bīstama aizsega centrā.

programme.title: What's on Filmzone?
programme.desc: Introducing movies on Filmzone.

programme.title: Stockholm
programme.desc: Based on the absurd but true 1973 bank heist and hostage crisis in Stockholm that was documented in the New Yorker as the origins of the 'Stockholm Syndrome'.

programme.title: 127 Hours
programme.desc: James Franco stars in director Danny Boyle's inspiring survival drama based on the incredible true story of Aron Ralston, who became trapped alone in a Utah canyon for days after slipping on a loose rock, and resorted to extraordinary measures in order to make it out of his dire predicament alive.

programme.title: Stay
programme.desc: Drama, starring Ewan McGregor and Ryan Gosling. Troubled art student Henry is furious when his usual therapist is replaced by stranger, and announces he will commit suicide at midnight the following Saturday. The new shrink, Sam, who has troubles of his own, races to find a way of helping his patient before disaster strikes. Naomi Watts and Bob Hoskins also star.

programme.title: Road to Perdition
programme.desc: Bonds of loyalty are put to the test when a hitman's son witnesses what his father does for a living.

programme.title: 127 Hours

programme.title: Good Kill
programme.desc: A family man begins to question the ethics of his job as a drone pilot.

programme.title: Bridge of Spies
programme.desc: During the Cold War, an American lawyer is recruited to defend an arrested Soviet spy in court, and then help the CIA facilitate an exchange of the spy for the Soviet captured American U2 spy plane pilot, Francis Gary Powers.

programme.title: True Story
programme.desc: When disgraced New York Times reporter Michael Finkel meets accused killer Christian Longo – who has taken on Finkel's identity – his investigation morphs into a game of cat-and-mouse.

programme.desc: Introducing movies on Filmzone Plus.

programme.title: Monster's Ball
programme.desc: After a family tragedy, a racist prison guard re-examines his attitudes while falling in love with the African-American wife of the last prisoner he executed.

programme.title: Stockholm
programme.desc: Based on the absurd but true 1973 bank heist and hostage crisis in Stockholm that was documented in the New Yorker as the origins of the 'Stockholm Syndrome'.

programme.title: The Colossal Failure of the Modern Relationship
programme.desc: A woman's brief encounter with her boyfriend's charming boss leads to an affair. Overwhelmed by guilt, she breaks it off to make a final attempt to save her relationship.

programme.title: Monster's Ball
programme.desc: After a family tragedy, a racist prison guard re-examines his attitudes while falling in love with the African-American wife of the last prisoner he executed.

programme.title: Lincoln
programme.desc: As both sides tire of the ongoing American Civil War, United States President Abraham Lincoln fights on in a bid to change the constitution and end slavery forever. However, with the nation in turmoil and with many thousands of soldiers having already lost their lives, the outcome of the vote is far from certain, with many key members of his inner circle opposing the revolutionary change. Joseph Gordon-Levitt and Tommy Lee Jones also feature.

programme.title: Green Book
programme.desc: American biographical comedy-drama where the action is set in America in 1962. It is inspired by the true story of the Deep South tour by African American classical and jazz pianist Don Shirley and Italian American bouncer Frank Vallelonga, his driver and bodyguard. The film has got the name after The Negro Motorist Green Book, a mid-20th century guidebook for African-American travelers, which lists the few accommodations, restaurants, gas stations, and even doctors in which they are welcome. During the long journey a friendship slowly develops between the two very opposing men, and after the tour's end they spend Christmas Eve at Frank's home with his family.

programme.title: I'm Not There
programme.desc: Six incarnations of Bob Dylan: an actor, a folk singer, an electrified troubadour, Rimbaud, Billy the Kid, and Woody Guthrie. Put Dylan's music behind their adventures, soliloquies, interviews, marriage, and infidelity. Recreate 1960s documentaries in black and white. Put each at a crossroads, the artist becoming someone else. Jack, the son of Ramblin' Jack Elliott, finds Jesus; handsome Robbie falls in love then abandons Claire. Woody, a lad escaped from foster care, hobos the U.S. singing; Billy awakes in a valley threatened by a six-lane highway; Rimbaud talks. Jude, booed at Newport when he goes electric, fences with reporters, pundits, and fans. He won't be classified.

programme.title: Nr. 309
programme.desc: Starring Demet Özdemir, and Furkan Palalı, this Turkish drama series follows the travails of a family as they try to carry out the wishes of the deceased patriarch, a multi-milionaire who has stipulated that the first of his grandchildren to marry and produce a child will inherit his share of the family business. The dead father's daughters rush to set up blind dates for their children and it is under these circumstances that Onur and Lale meet. Their date is fun-filled and full of crazy drunkenness. But when they wake up the next morning on room no. 309 of a hotel, neither can remember exactly what transpired the previous night. Agreeing to part company and never to see each other again, they go their seperate ways. However, three months later, Lale realises that she is pregnant and that Onur must be the father.

programme.title: Ēnu čuksti
programme.desc: Ghost Whisperer is an American supernatural TV series that follows the life of Melinda Gordon, a young woman with the ability to talk to ghosts, as she struggles to live as close to normal a life as she can. She helps earthbound spirits to cross over to the other world as their earthly representative. Whether it's guilt or some unfinished business that is keeping them from attaining eternal peace, it's up to Melinda to figure it all out.

programme.title: 19. ugunsdzēsēju depo
programme.desc: Visi kļūst mazliet mazāk entuziastiski, kad komandā ienāk Salivans. Raiens sastopas ar kādu no savas pagātnes. Salivans, Endijs un Māja risina kādu ugunsgrēku pamestā ēkā.

programme.title: 19. ugunsdzēsēju depo
programme.desc: Salivans turpina ieguldīties, lai satuvinātu ugunsdzēsējus un policistus – viņš izlēmis novadīt semināru, taču tas nenotiek kā plānots. Tikmēr Bens un Miranda sirsnīgi izrunājuši jautājumus par savu laulību, liekot Mirandai pieņemt smagu lēmumu par savu nākotni.

programme.title: Advokāte manča
programme.desc: Munch ends up being an accomplice to a prison break at a woman's correctional facility. Lise, a supermarket checkout operator, convicted of theft, escapes from prison to find out the truth about her husband Pierrick's suspicious suicide. Munch and her team break into the mortuary and investigate supermarket inventory to try to understand what happened to the unhappy family man. Meanwhile, Munch's past resurfaces and we finally discover who the little boy is in the photo on her desk.

programme.title: Advokāte manča
programme.desc: When a renowned chef calls for Munch's help in the middle of the night, having just discovered the corpse of her assistant on the famous restaurant's kitchen floor, it opens up a case that is sure to cook up trouble for Munch. To protect her client, she sabotages the crime scene, which has an incriminating message in blood, and sends Gaspard in as an undercover spy at the restaurant's washing station. But it turns out that the victim had quite a few enemies and the talented chef didn't really tell the whole story.

programme.title: Čikāga liesmās
programme.desc: Stāsts par Čikāgas ugunsdzēsēju un paramdeiķu brigādi – viņu ikdienu, izsaukumiem uz notikumu vietām, bīstamo un pašaizliedzīgo darbu, kā arī savstarpējām attiecībām. Situācija saasinās, kad kādā no glābšanas operācijām bojā iet viens no ugunsdzēsējiem, un viņa kolēģi notikušajā vaino paši sevi viens otru. Tomēr viņiem nākas pārvarēt savas nesaskaņas, jo uz nelaimes gadījumu vietām jādodas kā vienotai un saskaņotai komandai.

programme.title: Čikāga liesmās
programme.desc: Stāsts par Čikāgas ugunsdzēsēju un paramdeiķu brigādi – viņu ikdienu, izsaukumiem uz notikumu vietām, bīstamo un pašaizliedzīgo darbu, kā arī savstarpējām attiecībām. programme.title: Bon Appetit
programme.desc: Romantiska drāma Spānija, Vācija, Šveice, Itālija, 2010 Režisors Davids Pinilloss Lomās Unaks Ugalde, Nora Čirnere, Herberts Knaups, Džūlio Berruti Daniels ir talantīgs pavārs no Spānijas, kurš nupat sācis strādāt izsmalcinātā restorānā Cīrihē un pavisam drīz izpelnās šefpavāra un īpašnieka Tomasa atzinību. Viņš sadraudzējas ar jaunajiem kolēģiem – vācieti Hannu un itāli Hugo – un, šķiet, viņu starpā izveidosies tuva draudzība. Taču ne vienmēr cilvēku attiecības ir tik vienkāršas. Daniels iemīlas vienmēr optimistiskajā un neparastajā Hannā, kura ir precētā Tomasa mīļākā, turklāt Tomass nespēj satikt ar Hugo, kamēr Danielu viņš vienmēr slavē. Viens skūpsts izmaina vairāku cilvēku dzīves, un galu galā stāsta iznākums ir negaidīts

programme.title: Gatavots Itālijā kopā ar Silviju Koloku
programme.desc: Silvija Koloka apmeklē trīs Itālijas reģionus, kas ir tuvi viņas sirdij – Abruzo, Le Marche un Molīzi -, lai no jauna atklātu kulinārijas noslēpumus, gatavojot veselīgu, sirdij tīkamu un pieejamu ēdienu ikviena gaumei.

programme.title: Gatavots Itālijā kopā ar Silviju Koloku
programme.desc: Silvija Koloka apmeklē trīs Itālijas reģionus, kas ir tuvi viņas sirdij – Abruzo, Le Marche un Molīzi -, lai no jauna atklātu kulinārijas noslēpumus, gatavojot veselīgu, sirdij tīkamu un pieejamu ēdienu ikviena gaumei.

programme.title: Bondi raža ar Guy Turland
programme.desc: Welcome to Bondi Harvest! In this episode Guy shows us his Bondi, starting at his apartment where Guy makes a delicious summer granola with hasselback baked apples. Then it's under the waves with local free-diving legend Ian Pucko Puckeridge as the two jump in a tinny and skirt around the steep and spectacular North Bondi cliffs.

programme.title: Bondi raža ar Guy Turland
programme.desc: Saturday mornings are a ritual for many Bondi locals – it's market day. The early bird catches the worm so Guy and his mate Mitch hit the markets for the freshest "direct from the farm" produce.

programme.title: Kandisa Renuāra
programme.desc: Stāsts par franču policisti Kendisu Renuāru un viņas komandu, kas risina dažādus noziegumus ostas pilsētā Francijas dienvidos. Kendisa ir nesen šķīrusies četru bērnu māte, un viņas ikdienas rutīna ir būt starp noziegumu risināšanu un bērniem.

programme.title: Bīstamās mammītes
programme.desc: Mayte Soldevilla, a divorced mother of two, invites a group of people to her house in an attempt to sell them kitchen appliances but only three of her friends show up- Lourdes Sanguino, Virginia Torres and Amparo Pérez and a woman named Elvira who joins them in the last minute. During the demonstration of TurboThunder 3000, machine malfunctions and accidentally causes Elvira's death. Since Elvira was making their lives difficult and they all had motives for killing her, and in fear that the people around them will think that they did it on purpose, four women will try to hide the tragic outcome. That will be easier said that done, as they find themselves in crazy situations and a dangerous spiral of crimes to protect their secret in this outrageous dark comedy series.

programme.title: 19. ugunsdzēsēju depo
programme.desc: Debesskrāpī sācies ugunsgrēks, kā dēļ dzīvības karājas mata galā. Pruita veselība ir nopietnās briesmās. Pieredzējuši ugunsdzēsēji ieradušies depo, liekot pārējiem spriest, kāda būs viņu nākotne.

programme.title: 19. ugunsdzēsēju depo
programme.desc: Šī ir situācija par dzīvību un nāvi – jauns zēns iekritis ūdens caurulēs zem Sietlas ielām. Pulkstenis tikšķ, un depo glābējiem jāiesaistās nekavējoties.

programme.title: 19. ugunsdzēsēju depo
programme.desc: Kad depo saņem zvanu no noraizējušiem kaimiņiem, komanda dodas izpētē. Ierodoties notikuma vietā, viņi ir šokēti par iekšienē atrodamo. Tikmēr, cenšoties radīt attiecības starp policistiem un ugunsdzēsējiem, Raiens negaidīti komandā pieņem jaunu darbinieku.

programme.desc: Ghost Whisperer is an American supernatural TV series that follows the life of Melinda Gordon, a young woman with the ability to talk to ghosts, as she struggles to live as close to normal a life as she can. She helps earthbound spirits to cross over to the other world as their earthly representative. Whether it's guilt or some unfinished business that is keeping them from attaining eternal peace, it's up to Melinda to figure it all out.

programme.title: Rezidents
programme.desc: On Nic's first day back at Chastain, the man who attacked her is admitted to the ER, causing her to confront her trauma head-on. Cain, now in recovery, is self-conscious of his physical state and sets his eye on taking down Mina. Meanwhile, new intern Leela (guest star Anuja Joshi), both struggles and shines throughout her first day, causing Devon and Conrad to wonder if something bigger is going on.

programme.title: Čikāga liesmās
programme.desc: Stāsts par Čikāgas ugunsdzēsēju un paramdeiķu brigādi – viņu ikdienu, izsaukumiem uz notikumu vietām, bīstamo un pašaizliedzīgo darbu, kā arī savstarpējām attiecībām. programme.title: Labās raganas liktenis
programme.desc: Par Keisiju Naitingeilu noteikti ir kas maģisks. Taču, kad pat viņas mīļotie sāk spriest, kā viņa pamanās zināt visu un būt visur, labā ragana sāk nojaust, ka ceļš nebūs rožains. Ģimenei raizējoties par viņas drošību, Keisija ir apņēmusies nolīdzināt visas situācijas ar izmēģinātu un drošu metodi – humoru, atklātību un otra likteņa pieņemšanu.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Ancient Aliens is an American TV series in a documentary style focusing on hypothesis that historical texts, archaeological evidence and legends of different nations contain facts of past human-extraterrestrial contact. More than once everything unusual and most unbelievable have eventually turned out to be real. So this version can be fairly realistic- intelligent life forms from other galaxies visited the Earth millions years ago. They brought most advanced game-changing technologies, that changed the course of history. It makes us think again about the descent of man and modern progress of humankind. Strange drawings have been found in the caves, portraying runways in Peru and Indian texts have been deciphered, describing "flying machinery", called gods.

programme.title: Forged in Fire
programme.desc: Forged in Fire, an American competition series aired on the History Channel, challenges four new competitors to produce a knife in their own style with a small variety of metal objects to create from. The series, hosted by Wil Willis, consists of a three-round elimination contest to forge bladed weapons, with the final winner receiving $10,000 and the day's championship title. Judged by experts in weapon history and use, the last two people standing must create in their own forge a Moro Kris sword, a blade which dates back to 300BC, in just five days. Filmed in Brooklyn, New York, the set referred to as "The Forge" sets the scene for this suspenseful show with propane forges, power hammers and hydraulic presses, with medical personnel being close by to treat any injuries or other health problems. If the medical personnel suspect that the competitors are unable to continue safely, they will be disqualified. Once each competitor has created their weapon, it will be put through a series of tests including chopping/slashing/stabbing objects such as ropes, ice blocks, animal carcasses and steel car doors. Having to meet a number of criteria's, the smiths battle it out, without their swords, to become the best black-smith.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: In Storage Wars show a team of professional buyers will prove that for a good buy you need more than certain sum of money. When rent is not paid on a storage locker for a certain period, the contents can be sold as a single lot of items in the form of an auction. The best experts are fighting for containers' contents, hundreds of thousands of dollars are sometimes in the game. Every participant has only some minutes to inspect the contents, and that only without entering the storage room, just looking inside. Each purchase can become a win or a loss, and nobody knows exactly whether they are buying real treasures or garbage.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Pawn Stars reality show is about every day routine at Gold & Silver Pawn Shop based in Las Vegas, Nevada. It is a family business, three generations of Harrison family are buying and then selling unique objects that are of considerable historical, artistic or other cultural value. The main purpose is to make a profit which means separate the wheat from the chaff, have a keen scent for one-of-a-kind authentic items and recognize fake stuff as well as appraise items value flawlessly. It is absolutely breath-taking to watch the Harrisons run their shop, it is a mixture of psychological skills and business activity. Who would have thought that this ordinary, at first glance, job could be so jaw-droppingly fascinating.

programme.title: Nature Gone Wild
programme.desc: Backcountry guide and explorer Greg Aiello offers insight into unfiltered footage of man, animal kingdom and nature gathered from all over the globe and touches the bottom of what caused each unimaginable occurrence. Eye-popping collection of videos of natural disasters, animal attacks, whether a dog rescues a drowning deer or kayakers come across a whale, Greg has it all.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Pawn Stars reality show is about every day routine at Gold & Silver Pawn Shop based in Las Vegas, Nevada. It is a family business, three generations of Harrison family are buying and then selling unique objects that are of considerable historical, artistic or other cultural value. The main purpose is to make a profit which means separate the wheat from the chaff, have a keen scent for one-of-a-kind authentic items and recognize fake stuff as well as appraise items value flawlessly. It is absolutely breath-taking to watch the Harrisons run their shop, it is a mixture of psychological skills and business activity. programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: In Storage Wars show a team of professional buyers will prove that for a good buy you need more than certain sum of money. When rent is not paid on a storage locker for a certain period, the contents can be sold as a single lot of items in the form of an auction. The best experts are fighting for containers' contents, hundreds of thousands of dollars are sometimes in the game. Every participant has only some minutes to inspect the contents, and that only without entering the storage room, just looking inside. Each purchase can become a win or a loss, and nobody knows exactly whether they are buying real treasures or garbage.

programme.title: Forged in Fire
programme.desc: Forged in Fire, an American competition series aired on the History Channel, challenges four new competitors to produce a knife in their own style with a small variety of metal objects to create from. The series, hosted by Wil Willis, consists of a three-round elimination contest to forge bladed weapons, with the final winner receiving $10,000 and the day's championship title. Judged by experts in weapon history and use, the last two people standing must create in their own forge a Moro Kris sword, a blade which dates back to 300BC, in just five days. Filmed in Brooklyn, New York, the set referred to as "The Forge" sets the scene for this suspenseful show with propane forges, power hammers and hydraulic presses, with medical personnel being close by to treat any injuries or other health problems. If the medical personnel suspect that the competitors are unable to continue safely, they will be disqualified. Once each competitor has created their weapon, it will be put through a series of tests including chopping/slashing/stabbing objects such as ropes, ice blocks, animal carcasses and steel car doors. Having to meet a number of criteria's, the smiths battle it out, without their swords, to become the best black-smith.

programme.title: Custom Cars: Las Vegas
programme.desc: Counting Cars is an American reality TV series, which is the third spinoff of TV series Pawn Stars. It is filmed in Las Vegas, Nevada, and follows daily activities at Count's Kustoms, a company owned and operated by Legendary Danny Koker a.k.a. The Count, its main aim is to restore and customize all kinds of motor vehicles, automobiles, and motorcycles in particular. Danny and his team stop at nothing to find, get, transform and finally sell the greatest rides of all time, being creative about every project.

programme.title: The Best of MonsterQuest
programme.desc: Something strange is killing animals and sucking the blood from its victims. Is this creature the mysterious Chupacabra of legend, or a gruesome new hybrid mutation?

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: American Pickers is an American reality series that follows ingenious "pickers" Mike Wolfe, and his business partner, Frank Fritz, as they hunt down objects with historical, collectible and pop culture value. They travel around the United States to buy or "pick" various items for resale, for clients, or for their own personal collections. Danielle Colby is in charge of their office of Antique Archaeology.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Ancient Aliens is an American TV series in a documentary style focusing on hypothesis that historical texts, archaeological evidence and legends of different nations contain facts of past human-extraterrestrial contact. More than once everything unusual and most unbelievable have eventually turned out to be real. So this version can be fairly realistic- intelligent life forms from other galaxies visited the Earth millions years ago. They brought most advanced game-changing technologies, that changed the course of history. It makes us think again about the descent of man and modern progress of humankind. Strange drawings have been found in the caves, portraying runways in Peru and Indian texts have been deciphered, describing "flying machinery", called gods.

programme.title: World's Greatest Treasure Mysteries
programme.desc: In all corners of the globe there are whispers of hidden treasures, abandoned loots lost in time, just waiting to be found. This documentary series follows Rick and Marty Lagina as they dive into some of the most famous treasure hunts known to man, examining previous expeditions, divulging fascinating details and, in some cases, unearthing exciting new evidence. These hunters are devoted to the cause, exploring every angle to advance the search of forgotten treasures.

programme.title: Secret Wars Uncovered
programme.desc: Documentary series examining some of the most controversial and covert military operations since the Second World War. Featuring testimonies from ex-army personnel, diplomats, journalists and academics, the series investigates the battles rarely brought to light, questioning the unethical nature and lasting impact of these military missions, and revealing the weaponry used, the reason for war, and the secrecy involved.

programme.title: Swamp Ghost
programme.desc: On February 23rd 1942, a bullet-riddled U.S. B-17E bomber Crash landed in a remote swamp in Papua New Guinea. SWAMP GHOST is an hour long documentary covering the attempt to recover the long lost aircraft.

programme.title: Tobot
programme.desc: Tobot is a South Korean animated TV series featuring transforming cars, some of which are designed after Kia Motors vehicles. Twin brothers Ryan and Kory live with their father, Dr. Franklin Char, robot technology expert, in a small town. Dr. Franklin Char has become physically handicapped after a car accident, in which his wife died. But he holds up well and decides to create robots for his sons, who will protect and support them and be their friends. Twins are going to have unforgettable adventures.

programme.title: Enchantimals: Sunny Savanna
programme.desc: The Wonderwood besties help the Sunny Savanna crew prepare for the Sparkle Spectacular, joining in on the glittery fun and learning important lessons along the way. Because, in Sunny Savanna, we're always better together.

programme.title: The Wild Adventures of Blinky Bill
programme.desc: Australian cartoon series about a mischievous little koala called Blinky Bill and his best mate Jacko who live in the town of Greenpatch. Blinky Bill may be small but he's taken it upon himself to look after his hometown and its residents. So whether it's protecting his neighbours from a dangerous crocodile, helping a princess find her prince or defending Greenpatch against aliens, Blinky Bill is always on hand to help out. Based on the best-selling children's books by a New Zealand-born writer and illustrator, Dorothy Wall. Blinky Bill is thought of as a classic children's character in Australia and has been entertaining kids around the world for decades.

programme.title: The Wild Adventures of Blinky Bill

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago Secrets of Hidden Spinjitsu
programme.desc: Ninjago was created by the First Master of Spinjitzu using the Four Golden Weapons. Wu and Garmadon fought, and the older brother, Garmadon, was banished to the Underworld. Peace didn't last for long, as Garmadon had sent Skeletons from the underworld to steal the four Weapons. Sensei Wu found four teenagers to train as ninja; Kai, Jay, Cole, and Zane, one of whom, Kai, had a sister, Nya, who had been captured by the Skeletons.

programme.title: Power Rangers Beast Morphers
programme.desc: This action programme is set in the future, and follows the Power Rangers, but not as we have always known them. A secret agency has combined a new substance, called "Morph-X" , with animal DNA to create the Power Rangers Morphers team. Together, these Rangers fight an evil virus, which is determined to take all of the Ranger power, stored inside the Morphin Grid. This set of heroes fiercely protect this, in a tale of adventure, excitement, and also great risk. There's no rest for these Rangers, and they are always on high alert, ready to fight evil.

programme.title: Treasure Trekkers
programme.desc: Treasure Trekkers follows the intrepid adventures of three heroic mouse-sized adventurers, who are tasked with preserving and protecting the priceless treasures of the world. Mo, Mac and Mip embark on challenging quests unearthing rare and sometimes magical artifacts, whilst learning to navigate their differences and discovering that the most precious treasures – friendship, kindness and respect – are the ones that come from within.

programme.title: Stoked
programme.desc: Stoked is a story about six teens and their not so wonderful summer jobs on the majestical Sunset Island. They spend their summer working at resort which turns out to be more than they bargained for, the hours are bad, the uniforms suck, and their manager isn´t the nicest of people, but they de-stress by surfing the choicest waves when they don´t have to work.

programme.title: Jessie
programme.desc: Jessie is an American comedy television series about a young girl, Jessie Prescott from Texas who moves to New York and becomes a nanny in a wealthy family. The Ross family she works for lives in a multimillion-dollar penthouse on the Upper West Side. The four kids, Emma, Luke, Ravi and Zuri are quite uncontrolled, but Jessie gets on well with them very fast and the real fun begins. Step by step Jessie makes every day of quiet and steady life of the Ross family feel like it's Christmas, as she is full of energy, jokes and enthusiasm.

programme.title: Wizards of Waverly Place
programme.desc: Wizards of Waverly Place is an American fantasy teen sitcom focusing on three Russo siblings with magical abilities. The Russo family are nothing but ordinary: their father is a former family wizard, and their mother is mortal. When the Russo siblings complete their wizard training, they have to participate in a competition to decide who will become the Family Wizard and keep magical powers forever, while the others lose their powers and become mortals.

programme.title: Lego Friends: Girls On A Mission
programme.desc: There is a mission and it is not an easy one! Heartlake City is under a lot of pressure from some very bad people who do very bad things. The LEGO Friends are five young girls who all have a really close friendship: best friends Andrea, Emma, Mia, Olivia and Stephanie have extremely kind girls who decide to dedicate all of their time into protecting the people who live in the city. Whether they are saving people from a huge fire; stopping mayhem caused by the Alvahbots or ridding the sea from a load of unwanted trash – the LEGO Friends will always have a solution and will do it without complaining! Every day, the girls are faced with a brand new challenge that is completely unexpected. Who knows what the challenge will be; how will they fix the problem? Children's animated television series.

programme.title: Lego Friends: Girls On A Mission

programme.title: Jungle Bunch
programme.desc: This CGI animation follows the story of 'The Jungle Bunch', a self-proclaimed group of disparate jungle animals who have taken it upon themselves to protect other creatures from the many threats and dangers that can lurk in the depths of the jungle. Led by warrior tiger Maurice (who is actually a penguin!), the crew are made up of Maurice's adopted son, Junior, who is learning the ropes; Miguel the strong gorilla, tarsier Gilbert, who has all the smarts; compassionate Batricia, the bat; and the inseparable toads Al and Bob. The troop represent justice and hope and are always ready for fun and adventure.

programme.title: Jungle Bunch
programme.desc: This CGI animation follows the story of 'The Jungle Bunch', a self-proclaimed group of disparate jungle animals who have taken it upon themselves to protect other creatures from the many threats and dangers that can lurk in the depths of the jungle. The troop represent justice and hope and are always ready for fun and adventure.

programme.title: Gormiti
programme.desc: CGI animated series with action and adventure. For thousands of years, the Island of Gorm has lived in peace. But the Gormiti, the residents of the island, have always known that harmony would not last forever. They knew the fearful Magor, the leader of the Volcano tribe, would one day return for revenge. The Gormiti warriors from four other tribes – Earth, Air, Sea, and Forest – must work together to defeat him and his tribe.

programme.title: Transformers: Cyberverse
programme.desc: Transformers: Cyberverse is a cel shaded computer animated series based on the Transformers toy franchise. Bumblebee receives an important task, several lives depend on him but the problem is that he has forgotten everything! It's a good thing that his friend and partner Windblade comes to the rescue and helps him repair his damaged memory files. Each new memory reopens Bumblebee's past adventures on Cybertron, before arrival to Earth. He experiences fun moments with his friends all over again, moments that changed his life. This past has made him the hero we all know. Each step in fighting Bumblebee's amnesia provides new tips to the friends, so sooner or later it will help them perform their mission and stay away from trouble.

programme.title: 100% Wolf
programme.desc: Freddy Lupin knows he's got what it takes to run with the elite werewolf Night Patrol. All he has to do is win a place at the prestigious Howlington Academy, keep his fluffy butt out of trouble and graduate. Easy, right? WRONG! Being the first dog at a werewolf-only finishing school is tougher than Freddy ever imagined.

programme.title: Enchantimals: Sunny Savanna
programme.desc: The Wonderwood besties help the Sunny Savanna crew prepare for the Sparkle Spectacular, joining in on the glittery fun and learning important lessons along the way. Because, in Sunny Savanna, we're always better together.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends
programme.desc: Thomas and Friends presents life on Island of Sodor somewhere in Britain. There are several railways where all machines are animate creatures, they live and work there. Each of them tries to perform their job perfectly. The main character is a little blue tank engine Thomas, who travels to different places, gets to know different people and helps everybody who need it. Sometimes Thomas makes mistakes but it only teaches him not to repeat them in future. His friends are as hardworking as he is. Thomas and his team deliver mails, repair railway, take passengers wherever they need. Thomas and Friends can teach young viewers significant lessons of true value of friendship and importance of teamwork.

programme.title: My Little Pony
programme.desc: The ponies share adventures and help out other residents of Ponyville, while working out the troublesome moments in their own friendships.

programme.title: Moominvalley
programme.desc: This award-winning animation from Finland follows the adventures of our protagonist, the curious, perceptive and optimistic Moomintroll. The viewer can enjoy this coming-of-age tale as our teenage hero attempts to overcome the obstacles of growing up within his beloved family unit while still being true to his own individual character. He has a loving mother, Moominmama, and a sentimental father, Moominpapa who he lives with in harmony with their natural surroundings. He also enjoys adventures to the magical land beyond Moominvalley with his friends, the free-spirited wanderer Snufkin, the chaotic Little My, daydreamer Snorkmaiden, cowardly Sniff, and many others.

programme.title: Heidi
programme.desc: Heidi is a little girl who is full of beans. She faces many problems up in the Swiss alps whilst living with her grandfather. Heidi lights up and soothes the people and animals all around her, with her enthusiastic, generous and wonderful zest for life. This bubbly, young orphan girl will learn the priceless value of friendship and mutual respect. Follow her journey as she dicovers life's ups and downs.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago Secrets of Hidden Spinjitsu
programme.desc: Ninjago was created by the First Master of Spinjitzu using the Four Golden Weapons. Wu and Garmadon fought, and the older brother, Garmadon, was banished to the Underworld. Peace didn't last for long, as Garmadon had sent Skeletons from the underworld to steal the four Weapons. Sensei Wu found four teenagers to train as ninja; Kai, Jay, Cole, and Zane, one of whom, Kai, had a sister, Nya, who had been captured by the Skeletons.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago Secrets of Hidden Spinjitsu
programme.desc: Ninjago was created by the First Master of Spinjitzu using the Four Golden Weapons. Wu and Garmadon fought, and the older brother, Garmadon, was banished to the Underworld. Peace didn't last for long, as Garmadon had sent Skeletons from the underworld to steal the four Weapons. Sensei Wu found four teenagers to train as ninja; Kai, Jay, Cole, and Zane, one of whom, Kai, had a sister, Nya, who had been captured by the Skeletons.

programme.title: Power Rangers Beast Morphers
programme.desc: This action programme is set in the future, and follows the Power Rangers, but not as we have always known them. A secret agency has combined a new substance, called "Morph-X" , with animal DNA to create the Power Rangers Morphers team. Together, these Rangers fight an evil virus, which is determined to take all of the Ranger power, stored inside the Morphin Grid. This set of heroes fiercely protect this, in a tale of adventure, excitement, and also great risk. There's no rest for these Rangers, and they are always on high alert, ready to fight evil.

programme.title: Gormiti
programme.desc: CGI animated series with action and adventure. For thousands of years, the Island of Gorm has lived in peace. But the Gormiti, the residents of the island, have always known that harmony would not last forever. They knew the fearful Magor, the leader of the Volcano tribe, would one day return for revenge. The Gormiti warriors from four other tribes – Earth, Air, Sea, and Forest – must work together to defeat him and his tribe.

programme.title: Treasure Trekkers
programme.desc: Treasure Trekkers follows the intrepid adventures of three heroic mouse-sized adventurers, who are tasked with preserving and protecting the priceless treasures of the world. Mo, Mac and Mip embark on challenging quests unearthing rare and sometimes magical artifacts, whilst learning to navigate their differences and discovering that the most precious treasures – friendship, kindness and respect – are the ones that come from within.

programme.title: 100% Wolf
programme.desc: Freddy Lupin knows he's got what it takes to run with the elite werewolf Night Patrol. All he has to do is win a place at the prestigious Howlington Academy, keep his fluffy butt out of trouble and graduate. Easy, right? WRONG! Being the first dog at a werewolf-only finishing school is tougher than Freddy ever imagined.

programme.title: Jessie
programme.desc: Jessie is an American comedy television series about a young girl, Jessie Prescott from Texas who moves to New York and becomes a nanny in a wealthy family. The Ross family she works for lives in a multimillion-dollar penthouse on the Upper West Side. The four kids, Emma, Luke, Ravi and Zuri are quite uncontrolled, but Jessie gets on well with them very fast and the real fun begins. Step by step Jessie makes every day of quiet and steady life of the Ross family feel like it's Christmas, as she is full of energy, jokes and enthusiasm.

programme.title: Wizards of Waverly Place
programme.desc: Wizards of Waverly Place is an American fantasy teen sitcom focusing on three Russo siblings with magical abilities. The Russo family are nothing but ordinary: their father is a former family wizard, and their mother is mortal. When the Russo siblings complete their wizard training, they have to participate in a competition to decide who will become the Family Wizard and keep magical powers forever, while the others lose their powers and become mortals.

programme.title: Andi Mack
programme.desc: On the eve of her 13th birthdday, Andi's (Peyton Elizabeth Lee) free spirited big sister, Bex, returns home from her nomadic travels around the world. Andi is delighted at the prospect of having an exciting accomplice who can help her to bend her mother's strict rules and who she can learn from. However, it is soon diisclosed that Bex is, in fact, Andi's real mother and Celia, who Andi thought was her mother, is really her grandmother. This shocking revelation forces Andi to embark on a contemplative journey of self diiscovery. She is helped by her best friends Cyrus and Buffy who are also trying to find their way in the world. This is a heart warming coming-of-age tale that touches on some adult themes in a positive manner while also being loads of fun!

programme.title: Lego Friends: Girls On A Mission
programme.desc: There is a mission and it is not an easy one! Heartlake City is under a lot of pressure from some very bad people who do very bad things. The LEGO Friends are five young girls who all have a really close friendship: best friends Andrea, Emma, Mia, Olivia and Stephanie have extremely kind girls who decide to dedicate all of their time into protecting the people who live in the city. Whether they are saving people from a huge fire; stopping mayhem caused by the Alvahbots or ridding the sea from a load of unwanted trash – the LEGO Friends will always have a solution and will do it without complaining! Every day, the girls are faced with a brand new challenge that is completely unexpected. Who knows what the challenge will be; how will they fix the problem? Children's animated television series.

programme.title: Lego Friends: Girls On A Mission

programme.title: Snow Queen 3
programme.desc: The rare gift of getting into all kinds of trouble is their family trait. What else can you expect from the ones raised among trolls in snowy lands? But now Kai and Gerda have grown up and entered a new stage – this time they are going to cause a global disaster...

programme.title: Stoked
programme.desc: Stoked is a story about six teens and their not so wonderful summer jobs on the majestical Sunset Island. They spend their summer working at resort which turns out to be more than they bargained for, the hours are bad, the uniforms suck, and their manager isn´t the nicest of people, but they de-stress by surfing the choicest waves when they don´t have to work.

programme.title: Enchantimals: Saulainā Savanna
programme.desc: Brīnummeža draugi palīdz Saulainās Savannas iemītniekiem sagatavoties Spīguļojošajai Izrādei, paši iesaistoties vizuļojošajā jautrībā un vienlaikus gūstot svarīgas mācības. Saulainajā Savannā kopā vienmēr ir jautrāk.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa ir jauka, nekaunīga cūciņa, kas dzīvo ar savu mazo brāli Džordžu, kā arī sivēnu mammu un tēti. Pepas mīļākās nodarbes ir spēļu spēlēšana, pucēšanās, laiskošanās un rotaļāšanās dubļainās peļķēs. Viņas piedzīvojumi allaž beidzas laimīgi, skaļi un rukšķīgi skanot smiekliem.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa ir jauka, nekaunīga cūciņa, kas dzīvo ar savu mazo brāli Džordžu, kā arī sivēnu mammu un tēti. Pepas mīļākās nodarbes ir spēļu spēlēšana, pucēšanās, laiskošanās un rotaļāšanās dubļainās peļķēs. Viņas piedzīvojumi allaž beidzas laimīgi, skaļi un rukšķīgi skanot smiekliem.

programme.title: Kindi Kids
programme.desc: Animated children's series based on the toy range of the same name. Kindi Kids follows the adventures of a delightful group of colourful humans that live playfully in tribes. Each tribe is centered around a unique aspect or behaviour, such as the Shoppets, who are mischievous creatures always looking to cause destruction to their magical world, Rainbow Kindi. All of the tribes live in Rainbow Kindi, a vibrant and vivid world where the characters interact, often leading to hilarious events and situations. Young children are invited to join the colourful characters as they enjoy yet another series of amazing adventures.

programme.title: Alas klubs "Cave Club"
programme.desc: Esiet sveicināti piedzīvojumu, izpētes un pat dinozauru pasaulē. Kopā ar pieciem draugiem atklājiet negaidītu mūsdienas populārāko tendenču izcelsmi un risiniet visiem zināmas problēmas. Šie labākie draugi būs pirmie, kas visu redzēs un darīs, sākot ar pašu pirmo labāko draugu grupu "Alas klubs".

programme.title: Heidija
programme.desc: Heidija ir maza meitene ar lieliem sapņiem. Viņa Šveices alpos, dzīvojot ar vectēvu,saskaras ar daudzām problēmām. Heidija iepriecina un nomierina cilvēkus un dzīvniekus viņas tuvumā, ar savu entuziasmu, dāsnumu un burvīgo dzīvesprieku. Šī jaunā bārene

programme.desc: Tas ir Džojs! Ja uzskatāt, ka katrai problēmai ir garlaicīgs risinājums, jūs nepazīstat Džoju! Ar draugiem Olivu un Jasīnu viņš atradīs atjautīgākos un negaidītākos risinājumus, lai izkultos no nelāgām situācijām un palīdzētu citiem.

programme.title: Heidija
programme.desc: Heidija ir maza meitene ar lieliem sapņiem. Viņa Šveices alpos, dzīvojot ar vectēvu,saskaras ar daudzām problēmām. Heidija iepriecina un nomierina cilvēkus un dzīvniekus viņas tuvumā, ar savu entuziasmu, dāsnumu un burvīgo dzīvesprieku. Šī jaunā bārene

programme.title: Motopilsētas maģija

programme.title: Remija un Bū
programme.desc: Unikāla mazas meitenes Remijas un lieliska robota Bū draudzība. Remija ir zinātkāra sešus gadus veca meitene ar unikālu labāko draugu – Bū, lielu, mīkstu, rozā robotu. Ar Remijas mērķtiecību un Bū prasmēm viņu dienas Delfīnbejā ir abu iztēles radītu piedzīvojumu pilnas.

programme.title: Mans mazais ponijs: draudzība ir brīnums
programme.desc: Saņemot brīdinājumu par šausmīgu pareģojumu, Princese Celestia uz Poniju zemi sūta savu studenti Sparklu. Tā viņa cer pārliecināties, ka viss tiek sagatavots kā nākas, un ka jauniete iegūs vairākus draugus.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa ir jauka, nekaunīga cūciņa, kas dzīvo ar savu mazo brāli Džordžu, kā arī sivēnu mammu un tēti. Pepas mīļākās nodarbes ir spēļu spēlēšana, pucēšanās, laiskošanās un rotaļāšanās dubļainās peļķēs. Viņas piedzīvojumi allaž beidzas laimīgi, skaļi un rukšķīgi skanot smiekliem.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa ir jauka, nekaunīga cūciņa, kas dzīvo ar savu mazo brāli Džordžu, kā arī sivēnu mammu un tēti. Pepas mīļākās nodarbes ir spēļu spēlēšana, pucēšanās, laiskošanās un rotaļāšanās dubļainās peļķēs. Viņas piedzīvojumi allaž beidzas laimīgi, skaļi un rukšķīgi skanot smiekliem.

programme.title: Tobot
programme.desc: Izmeklējot virkni satiksmes negadījumu, Dr. Frenklins Čars tiek nolaupīts. Tas aktivizē viņa radītos Tobotus. Pirmie divi Toboti tiek uzticēti viņa dēliem Raienam un Korijam, lai apkaimi sargātu no noziedzības.

programme.title: Kindi Kids
programme.desc: Animated children's series based on the toy range of the same name. Kindi Kids follows the adventures of a delightful group of colourful humans that live playfully in tribes. Each tribe is centered around a unique aspect or behaviour, such as the Shoppets, who are mischievous creatures always looking to cause destruction to their magical world, Rainbow Kindi. All of the tribes live in Rainbow Kindi, a vibrant and vivid world where the characters interact, often leading to hilarious events and situations. Young children are invited to join the colourful characters as they enjoy yet another series of amazing adventures.

programme.title: Enchantimals: Saulainā Savanna
programme.desc: Brīnummeža draugi palīdz Saulainās Savannas iemītniekiem sagatavoties Spīguļojošajai Izrādei, paši iesaistoties vizuļojošajā jautrībā un vienlaikus gūstot svarīgas mācības. Saulainajā Savannā kopā vienmēr ir jautrāk.

programme.title: Blinkijs Bils
programme.desc: Blinkija Bila un viņa drauga Džeko piedzīvojumi, aizsargājot savas Austrālijas mājas no īstiem un izdomātiem draudiem.

programme.title: Blinkijs Bils
programme.desc: Blinkija Bila un viņa drauga Džeko piedzīvojumi, aizsargājot savas Austrālijas mājas no īstiem un izdomātiem draudiem.

programme.title: Alas klubs "Cave Club"
programme.desc: Esiet sveicināti piedzīvojumu, izpētes un pat dinozauru pasaulē. Kopā ar pieciem draugiem atklājiet negaidītu mūsdienas populārāko tendenču izcelsmi un risiniet visiem zināmas problēmas. Šie labākie draugi būs pirmie, kas visu redzēs un darīs, sākot ar pašu pirmo labāko draugu grupu "Alas klubs".

programme.title: Mazā pīlēna sapnis
programme.desc: Multiplikācijas īsfilmas jaunākajiem skatītājiem.

programme.title: Пингвин
programme.desc: Маленький, непоседливый пингвин по имени Пингу, вечно попадает в разного рода неприятности. Из-за своего любопытства, упрямости и непослушания, эти неприятности, зачастую, перерастают в настоящие беды. Но после того, как из неприятностей и бед ему помогает выбраться семья и друзья, он понимает что к чему и больше не совершает допущенных им ошибок. Этот мультфильм наглядный пример поговорки, в которой говорится: "на ошибках учатся"

programme.title: Крошка Милтон
programme.desc: Крошка Милтон и в самом деле очень маленький. Он живет в часах, стоящих на каминной полке в гостиной. О существовании Милтона не знает никто, кроме его лучшего друга Дугласа — огромного лохматого пса, который целый день дремлет перед камином или спасает Милтона от многочисленных опасностей.

programme.title: Машины сказки
programme.desc: Маша рассказывает своим игрушкам известные сказки народов мира в неповторимой детской манере — путая сюжеты и героев и завершая каждую историю неожиданным и остроумным выводом.

programme.title: Маша и Медведь
programme.desc: Маша — невероятно активная девочка, которая никогда не сидит на месте и считает, что весь мир создан для неё одной. Машина индивидуальность не знает границ, поэтому урок труда легко оборачивается строительством парусного корабля, а набор художника — в разукрашивание всего леса.

programme.title: Пингвин

programme.title: Привет, Китти
programme.desc: "Замечательные мультфильмы серии Вместе с Hello Kitty научат малышей принимать ванну перед сном, правильно разговаривать по телефону, самим одеваться. Веселая музыка и яркие персонажи не оставят равнодушными малышей, а и их родители успеют отдохнуть, пока дети находятся ""в гостях"" у Китти!"

programme.title: Инопланетяне
programme.desc: Пятеро странных, не похожих на людей инопланетных существ — Этно, Кенди, Горджис, Стерео и Бад — терпят крушение при посадке на Землю. Вернуться назад они не могут и вынуждены как-то осмыслять то, что происходит вокруг, за окнами заброшенного дома, в котором они скрытно поселились. Эти инопланетяне не любят скучать, поэтому постоянно выдумывают что-нибудь. А еще с ними приключаются забавные истории.

programme.title: Пингвин
programme.desc: Маленький, непоседливый пингвин по имени Пингу, вечно попадает в разного рода неприятности. Из-за своего любопытства, упрямости и непослушания, эти неприятности, зачастую, перерастают в настоящие беды. Этот мультфильм наглядный пример поговорки, в которой говорится: "на ошибках учатся"

programme.title: Приключения Тимми
programme.desc: "Маленький барашек Тимми, вместе со своими юными друзьями с фермы, отлично проводит время в детском саду, под надзором доброй цапли Гарриет и мудрого Филина Осборна. Там он учится многим хорошим вещам, в том числе и хорошему поведению. Немного упрямый и озорной Тимми может иногда напроказничать, но воспитатели всегда укажут ему на его ошибки и Тимми больше никогда не будет их повторять. О похождениях этого сорванца и будет идти речь в данном мультфильме."

programme.title: Привет, Китти
programme.desc: "Замечательные мультфильмы серии Вместе с Hello Kitty научат малышей принимать ванну перед сном, правильно разговаривать по телефону, самим одеваться. Веселая музыка и яркие персонажи не оставят равнодушными малышей, а и их родители успеют отдохнуть, пока дети находятся ""в гостях"" у Китти!"

programme.title: Малыши Юрского периода
programme.desc: Интересный и насыщенный красками мультипликационный сериал. Компания из нескольких маленьких динозавров потерялась и теперь путешествует по временным пространствам на волшебном черном метеорите, который когда-то упал на землю. Они ищут своих родителей и готовы совершать любые поступки, лишь бы отыскать их. Эпохи меняются, динозаврики постоянно попадают в различные интересные приключения. Единственная мечта маленьких героев – обрести настоящую семью. Поможет ли им метеорит осуществить такое заветное желание. Если есть сила и невероятное желание – возможно все. Ни смена времен и эпох, ни природные катаклизмы не помешают динозаврикам обрести семью. Мультсериал очень легкий и непринужденно воспринимается зрителями. Отлично подходит для проведения досуга в семейном кругу. В восторге будут и маленькие зрители и их родители.

programme.title: Маша и Медведь
programme.desc: Маша — невероятно активная девочка, которая никогда не сидит на месте и считает, что весь мир создан для неё одной. Машина индивидуальность не знает границ, поэтому урок труда легко оборачивается строительством парусного корабля, а набор художника — в разукрашивание всего леса.

programme.desc: Маша рассказывает своим игрушкам известные сказки народов мира в неповторимой детской манере — путая сюжеты и героев и завершая каждую историю неожиданным и остроумным выводом.

programme.title: Крошка Милтон
programme.desc: Крошка Милтон и в самом деле очень маленький. Он живет в часах, стоящих на каминной полке в гостиной. О существовании Милтона не знает никто, кроме его лучшего друга Дугласа — огромного лохматого пса, который целый день дремлет перед камином или спасает Милтона от многочисленных опасностей.

programme.title: Чебурашка идет в школу
programme.desc: Крокодил Гена выясняет, что Чебурашка не умеет читать и хочет устроить его в школу. Им неожиданно помогает старуха Шапокляк, которая устраивает срочное завершение ремонта школы к первому сентября. Крокодил Гена становится преподавателем по живой природе.

programme.title: Пингвин
programme.desc: Маленький, непоседливый пингвин по имени Пингу, вечно попадает в разного рода неприятности. Из-за своего любопытства, упрямости и непослушания, эти неприятности, зачастую, перерастают в настоящие беды. Но после того, как из неприятностей и бед ему помогает выбраться семья и друзья, он понимает что к чему и больше не совершает допущенных им ошибок. Этот мультфильм наглядный пример поговорки, в которой говорится: "на ошибках учатся"

programme.desc: Были и небылицы. Мультфильм, снятый по одноименной книге Э. Распэ о приключениях барона Мюнхгаузена.

programme.title: Приключения летающей собачки
programme.desc: Однажды щенок Випо узнал, что он особенный. Ведь он умеет летать с помощью своих огромных ушей! И теперь очаровательный песик и его лучшие друзья, аист Генри и игрушечная кошка Бетти, отправляются в захватывающее кругосветное путешествие.

programme.title: Пингвин
programme.desc: Маленький, непоседливый пингвин по имени Пингу, вечно попадает в разного рода неприятности. programme.title: 38 попугаев
programme.desc: Веселые истории о забавных приключениях четырех друзей — болтливой Мартышки, застенчивого Слоненка, разумного Попугая и задумчивого Удава.

programme.title: Приключения летающей собачки
programme.desc: Однажды щенок Випо узнал, что он особенный. Ведь он умеет летать с помощью своих огромных ушей! И теперь очаровательный песик и его лучшие друзья, аист Генри и игрушечная кошка Бетти, отправляются в захватывающее кругосветное путешествие.

programme.desc: Крошка Милтон и в самом деле очень маленький. Он живет в часах, стоящих на каминной полке в гостиной. programme.title: Приключения на волшебном острове
programme.desc: Прекрасная девочка Океана живет на райском острове вместе со своим дедушкой наставником. Другие дети постоянно дразнят ее за то, что у нее нет родителей. Из-за этого Океане становится грустно и одиноко, но она постепенно учится быть сильной и независимой. В этом ей помогает ее ум и хорошее чувство юмора. Океана не подозревает о своем прошлом, в котором была добрая фея, пираты и злой колдун. Ее мир переворачивается с ног на голову, когда колдун находит на дне океана магический кристальный шар. С его помощью колдун хочет захватить остров, и только Океана может его остановить. Герои этого мультфильма перенесут Вас в волшебный мир и с каждым новым эпизодом вы погрузитесь в атмосферу увлекательных приключений и веселых историй.

programme.title: Приключения Тимми
programme.desc: "Маленький барашек Тимми, вместе со своими юными друзьями с фермы, отлично проводит время в детском саду, под надзором доброй цапли Гарриет и мудрого Филина Осборна. Там он учится многим хорошим вещам, в том числе и хорошему поведению. Немного упрямый и озорной Тимми может иногда напроказничать, но воспитатели всегда укажут ему на его ошибки и Тимми больше никогда не будет их повторять. О похождениях этого сорванца и будет идти речь в данном мультфильме."

programme.title: Малыши Юрского периода
programme.desc: Интересный и насыщенный красками мультипликационный сериал. Компания из нескольких маленьких динозавров потерялась и теперь путешествует по временным пространствам на волшебном черном метеорите, который когда-то упал на землю. Они ищут своих родителей и готовы совершать любые поступки, лишь бы отыскать их. Эпохи меняются, динозаврики постоянно попадают в различные интересные приключения. Единственная мечта маленьких героев – обрести настоящую семью. Поможет ли им метеорит осуществить такое заветное желание. Если есть сила и невероятное желание – возможно все. Ни смена времен и эпох, ни природные катаклизмы не помешают динозаврикам обрести семью. Мультсериал очень легкий и непринужденно воспринимается зрителями. Отлично подходит для проведения досуга в семейном кругу. В восторге будут и маленькие зрители и их родители.

programme.title: Русалочка
programme.desc: Таинственные глубины моря хранят немало тайн, а обитатели океана могут рассказать множество удивительных историй. И самой невероятной из них была и остаётся история русалочки Ариэль. Дочь могущественного царя подводного мира Тритона, она однажды влюбляется в прекрасного и мужественного принца. Но разве они могут быть вместе — земной человек и морская дева? Однако настоящие чувства преодолевают любые преграды. Ради своей любви Ариэль готова пойти на всё. Даже если для обретения своего счастья ей навсегда придётся покинуть родной океан и навеки стать земной девушкой…

programme.title: Пингвин
programme.desc: Маленький, непоседливый пингвин по имени Пингу, вечно попадает в разного рода неприятности. Из-за своего любопытства, упрямости и непослушания, эти неприятности, зачастую, перерастают в настоящие беды. Но после того, как из неприятностей и бед ему помогает выбраться семья и друзья, он понимает что к чему и больше не совершает допущенных им ошибок. Этот мультфильм наглядный пример поговорки, в которой говорится: "на ошибках учатся"

programme.title: Приключения Тимми
programme.desc: "Маленький барашек Тимми, вместе со своими юными друзьями с фермы, отлично проводит время в детском саду, под надзором доброй цапли Гарриет и мудрого Филина Осборна. Там он учится многим хорошим вещам, в том числе и хорошему поведению. Немного упрямый и озорной Тимми может иногда напроказничать, но воспитатели всегда укажут ему на его ошибки и Тимми больше никогда не будет их повторять. О похождениях этого сорванца и будет идти речь в данном мультфильме."

programme.title: Газун
programme.desc: Мультфильм для детей дошкольного возраста. Забавные приключения семерых друзей: слона, птички, змеи, страуса, зебры и двух жирафов. Они живут в далекой африке среди зеленой травы и фиолетовых баобабов, где каждый день происходят удивительные истории. Искрометный юмор, обаятельные герои и красочная 3-D анимация не оставят равнодушными ни детей, ни взрослых!

programme.title: Эскимоска
programme.desc: Главные герои ежедневно ловят рыбу и всегда умудряются найти какой-то предмет, который начинают изучать

programme.title: Divgalvainā pūķa noslēpums. Ģimenes filma (oriģinālvalodas izvēle)
