Latin American Hot Borders
programme.desc: Latin American Hot Borders is a documentary series on National Geographic that follows stressful and tough working days of Customs officers. The borders in Latin America separate one country from another and at the same time legal from illegal as well. The viewers will witness a battle against the crime that goes to the extreme. Latin America is in the front line in a war against human trafficking, drugs, weapons and alcohol smuggling, money laundry, illegal immigration. In case this war is lost, the consequences can be terrible for many people.

programme.title: The Border
programme.desc: Documentary series. National Geographic takes you on the front line of the USA's border control. Featuring various divisions of the United States Department of Homeland Security including ICE (Immigration and Customs Enforcement) and Customs and Border Protection. We see how the professionals attempt to uphold the USA's immigration laws on the border and at other points of entry. Follow the Marine and Air Interdiction Agents, who patrol the Mexico–United States border; the most frequently crossed border in the world. Every day is a battle to stop illegal drugs, illegally imported goods, terrorists and other dangers from entering the country.

programme.title: Breakout
programme.desc: Convicted murderer, Harold Laird is known in prison as "MacGyver" for his ability to repair things using everyday materials. He is moved to the Stiles maximum security prison in Beaumont, Texas where he is placed in a block that houses white supremacist gang members. He fears the other prisoners are out to get him and goes about planning an escape using tools as simple as dental floss and a sheet.

programme.title: Nazi Megastructures
programme.desc: Once Hitler seizes power in 1933 he transforms his Alpine retreat in the sleepy district of Obersalzberg in Bavaria into a vast mansion called the Berghof. The area becomes a magnet for the most powerful Nazis and Hitler's Berghof a show piece for the Reich. Aided by his most trusted assistant Martin Bormann, Obersalzberg is quickly transformed into Hitler's own fortified fiefdom. It becomes home to 2,000 SS troops and is protected by a high level security system. High above the Berghof, on top of the 6000ft Kehlstein mountain, Bormann builds the Eagles Nest; a lavish tea house designed for Hitler to entertain guests and dignitaries. Within the safety of Obersalzberg Hitler's self-belief grows out of all proportion and he becomes increasingly detached from reality. And it is in his beloved Berghof, surrounded by breathtaking scenery, that he masterminds the ugliest plans in history. But as Hitler's war collapses and the Allied bombers increase their range Obersalzberg comes under threat. Bormann increases defences around Obersalzberg but also goes deep underground. Anti-aircraft guns are placed on the surrounding peaks and a five mile labyrinth of bunkers and tunnels are dug out beneath Obersalzberg – linking the Berghof and the houses of Hitler's elite inner circle. They are fully equipped to allow Hitler to run the country even if under attack. But for the last six months of the war Hitler is far from the safe refuge of Obersalzberg. As the Red Army closes in on Berlin he is holed up in his bunker there. He chooses not to run for the safety of his Alpine retreat. On April 25th 1945 the RAF bombard Obersalzberg obliterating it but those in the bunkers mostly survive unscathed. The Eagles Nest remains intact and still stands today as a reminder of the power Obersalzberg once held.

programme.title: Atlas of Cursed Places
programme.desc: The Bermuda Triangle. Everybody's heard about this stretch of cursed ocean off America's eastern coast where ships and aircraft disappear without explanation. Or do they? Sam dives in to the origin of the curse of the Bermuda Triangle and looks to oceanographers, physicists and probability analysts to get to the sandy wet bottom of this age-old ocean mystery.

programme.title: Bid & Destroy
programme.desc: Brian and Lee win a bid on an abandoned boarding house in Manchester, New Hampshire. They need to make a few thousand dollars in profit to make the job worth the bid but Brian is hopeful. During the hunt, Brian finds a few interesting items such as an old Harley-Davidson that was hidden in the grass, and a tiny bear make-up compact. As the hunt end, Lee comes across a problem that Brian forgot to mention-the house has oil tanks in the basement. As it turns out, the tanks contain oil which slows down the demolition greatly. At the end of the day, despite the setbacks, Danley walks out on top, making enough money to turn some profit.

programme.title: Construction Zone
programme.desc: It is the most famous road in the world-the Autobahn and one of the few places in the world where serious drivers can race luxury cars for seemingly endless stretches of mile after scenic mile¿at eye flattening speeds. The history, technology, and lore surround this modern marvel is truly impressive. Every driver that ever embraced the freedom of the open road owes a nod to Germany, because the modern highway was invented here. The Autobahn (meaning high-speed motorway system) is truly one of a kind.

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Tim and Fuzz have travelled to Milton Keynes to try and rescue Craig's 1930 Ford Model A, an historic car with an impressive pedigree. The car's owner is 58 year old former electrician Craig a dyed in the wool classic car lover. He's had his Model A for over 30 years, however after a tragic motor cycle accident any plans for restoration evaporated when his whole world was turned upside down. Once the car hits the Car SOS workshop its wooden coachwork and 90 year old parts prove a big challenge for the team.

programme.title: Strippers: Cars for Cash
programme.desc: Two teams compete to see who can make the most money by buying, breaking and selling parts from scrap cars. The challenge this time is for the teams is to source a 'supermini': a small, compact, lightweight car with exciting handling and good road manners. This irresistible combination has created an army of small car fanatics and in turn a large and potentially lucrative parts market for the boys to tap into. As fate would have it, it becomes the battle of the minis as George and Sheldon find an iconic classic Mini City and Ben and Frankie plump for the newer Mini Cooper. But who will emerge victorious in this battle of old vs vs. new?

programme.title: Strippers: Cars for Cash
programme.desc: Two teams compete to see who can make the most money by buying, breaking and selling parts from scrap cars. Fantastic 4x4s is the name of the game this time around as our two intrepid teams go in search of their very own off road icon to buy. Traditionally used for outdoor pursuits, 4x4 are now just as common on city streets as drivers seek the safety and comfort they provide for their urban cruiser of choice. This has upped the demand for parts but will it up our breakers profits? George and Sheldon opt for the best of British with the seminal Land Rover 90 whilst Frankie and Ben strike a distinctly Japanese theme with their Mitsubishi Pajero.

programme.title: Explorer 2.0
programme.desc: Hosted by Phil Keoghan, National Geographic's flagship series Explorer investigates global stories of science, nature and culture. It is the longest-running documentary series on cable and recipient of 52 Emmy Awards, 13 Cable ACE awards, the Genesis and Peabody Awards, and twice nominated for Academy Awards. Newly reformatted as a weekly 1-hour magazine series, episodes air in 171 countries in 45 languages and supported by 440 million viewers.

programme.title: Explorer 2.0
programme.desc: Phil Keoghan journeys to Peru to probe the mystery of the Boiling River. Mariana van Zeller investigates the unsolved attack on US Embassy workers in Cuba. Cara Santa Maria explores breakthrough technology for people with missing senses – from a BrainPort that allows the blind to see using their tongues to a vest that uses vibration to simulate hearing. Francesca Fiorentini heads to the Pacific Northwest to find out how snowflakes form into avalanches.

programme.title: Explorer 2.0
programme.desc: Hosted by Phil Keoghan, National Geographic's flagship series Explorer investigates global stories of science, nature and culture. It is the longest-running documentary series on cable and recipient of 52 Emmy Awards, 13 Cable ACE awards, the Genesis and Peabody Awards, and twice nominated for Academy Awards. Newly reformatted as a weekly 1-hour magazine series, episodes air in 171 countries in 45 languages and supported by 440 million viewers.

programme.title: Access 360° World Heritage
programme.desc: A threat looms over Kyoto, Japan's cultural center and a city with one of the most World Heritage sites in the world. Rapid modernization has decimated its traditional cityscape and threatens age-old cultural practices. Now, a team of warriors from various walks of life battle to preserve Kyoto's essence in the face of inevitable change. Gain 360? access to the world behind the monuments, where the traditional and modern come head to head and less-than-orthodox methods are being tested in the effort to safeguard Kyoto's traditional identity.

programme.title: Access 360° World Heritage
programme.desc: A gift to the United States from France and now a World Heritage Site, the Statue of Liberty is an international emblem of freedom and liberty. But over the past decade shes been off-limits, considered unsafe in a post-9/11 world. U-S Park Service and construction crews are now laboring to re-open this iconic statue. They are renovating her interior so people can get out quickly if theres an attack. But with the clock ticking to opening day, its a massive undertaking. Learning from the World Trade Center attacks, they are working to guarantee the safety of visitors and to ensure that one of Americas greatest symbols continues to stand tall over New York harbor.

programme.title: The Story of God with Morgan Freeman
programme.desc: In the greatly anticipated third season of The Story of God with Morgan Freeman, the legendary Academy Award winner continues his groundbreaking adventure. Morgan travels to ancient religious sites and modern-day centers of spiritual meaning to participate in dazzling cultural spectacles and hear moving personal stories. He explores the ways different religions shape our lives and the underlying themes that our faiths have in common.

programme.title: The Story of God with Morgan Freeman
programme.desc: In the greatly anticipated third season of The Story of God with Morgan Freeman, the legendary Academy Award winner continues his groundbreaking adventure. Morgan travels to ancient religious sites and modern-day centers of spiritual meaning to participate in dazzling cultural spectacles and hear moving personal stories. He explores the ways different religions shape our lives and the underlying themes that our faiths have in common.

programme.title: The Story of God with Morgan Freeman

Morgan travels to ancient religious sites and modern-day centers of spiritual meaning to participate in dazzling cultural spectacles and hear moving personal stories. He explores the ways different religions shape our lives and the underlying themes that our faiths have in common.

programme.title: The Story of God with Morgan Freeman
programme.desc: In the greatly anticipated third season of The Story of God with Morgan Freeman, the legendary Academy Award winner continues his groundbreaking adventure. Morgan travels to ancient religious sites and modern-day centers of spiritual meaning to participate in dazzling cultural spectacles and hear moving personal stories. He explores the ways different religions shape our lives and the underlying themes that our faiths have in common.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: A terrorist bombing in the Canary Islands reroutes dozens of flights to the Spanish island of Tenerife. The tiny airport is swamped, and with so many planes parked in the taxiways, controllers instruct departing flights to use the airport's only runway to get into position for takeoff. Amongst the planes leaving, obscured by the heavy fog-are two 747s. But Pan Am Flight 1736 is still on the runway when KLM Flight 4805 careens toward it. Killing 583 people, the high-speed collision remains the single deadliest aviation accident of all time. Blame soon falls on one pilot, but as investigators sift through the evidence the true story behind the Tenerife disaster grows more and more complex.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: After a one-hour flight from Taiwan, China Airlines Flight 120 touches down in Okinawa, Japan. The pilots park the Boeing 737 and switch off the engines. But just as they complete the shutdown checklist, a fire erupts and the aircraft is engulfed in flames. Incredibly, everyone on board escapes the inferno without injury. But the disaster leaves an international team of investigators with troubling questions. The hunt for answers seems like an endless quest as the smallest components come under intense scrutiny. The analysis eventually leads to a stunning discovery-the tiny failure that doomed Flight 120 is endangering lives around the world.

programme.title: Airport Security: First Class
programme.desc: Parents with kids are arrested for drug-trafficking. From Airport Security Colombia and Peru, cocaine busts that include families. A mother with kids going to Barcelona carries cocaine in food packages. A man with kids at home confesses. A mother leaving the country with kids uses fake documents. A woman with her infant son enters the country with help from officials. A couple are not what they seem. The woman did it to help her daughter.

programme.title: Airport Security: First Class
programme.desc: Carriers are often defiant towards officials, but crumble in the end. Cases of protest and denial from Airport Security Colombia and Peru. Sisters deny ingesting drugs but break down when one reveals she is pregnant. A drunk man denies the checked bag is his but is arrested and confesses. A young woman claims she is innocent but may have a mental illness. A young man with liquid cocaine in beer lies at first, but then breaks down.

programme.title: Airport Security: Peru and Brazil
programme.desc: At Jorge Chavez International Airport in Lima, Peru, security personnel work to stop the flow of drugs out of the country. A divorced couple denies traveling together, but carry identical bags filled with cocaine. A bag containing a white powder tests negative for cocaine, and police decide to dig deeper. A suspect hides cocaine in the handles of his carry-on. A man is found with over 35 capsules of cocaine in his belly.

programme.title: Airport Security: Peru and Brazil
programme.desc: The major challenge for police at Lima, Peru's Jorge Chavez International Airport: stop drug-trafficking. Officers arrest a man with cocaine-filled food packages. He may be hiding more. An elderly woman is stopped with drugs embedded in her bag. A mother with a drug-saturated package her suitcase says she is also being sent to work as a prostitute. A man claims drugs taped to his body are for personal use. A long-lost bag contains cocaine.

programme.title: Airport Security: Brazil
programme.desc: Federal Police at Sao Paolo International Airport work 24-7 to stop illegal activity. Their main threat, cocaine smuggling. A woman is caught trafficking cocaine inside packets of hair bleach. When she's hit with a dramatic fainting spell, officers fear the worst. Agents uncover nearly three kilos of cocaine inside photos of the Pope. And a man who attempted to run from police is arrested, his luggage lined with cocaine.

programme.title: Hunter Street
programme.desc: In this action-packed adventure comedy series we follow children of the Hunter family-Tess, Anika, Sal, Daniel and Max, the newest member of the family as they search for their missing foster parents through all Amsterdam. At the same time they must run from the people that mean them harm and solve the family mystery to uncover the special treasure and get their parents back and in the process they learn a lot about love and family.

programme.title: Hunter Street
programme.desc: In this action-packed adventure comedy series we follow children of the Hunter family-Tess, Anika, Sal, Daniel and Max, the newest member of the family as they search for their missing foster parents through all Amsterdam. At the same time they must run from the people that mean them harm and solve the family mystery to uncover the special treasure and get their parents back and in the process they learn a lot about love and family.

programme.title: School of Rock
programme.desc: School of Rock is an American musical-comedy television series based on the 2003 film of the same name. A group of teenagers of the prestigious american school have a pretty predictable life, until one day totally changes everything. Once they get a substitute teacher Dewey Finn and he instructs Tomika, Freddy, Summer, Zack and Lawrence in the art of rock and roll. Mr Finn has his own view on the lesson structure and he gets across to the students easily so they become his huge fans at once. Thanks to Mr Finn the teens create a rock band and learn to play different instruments. Rock helps them to realize that in order to become successful they must learn how to work as a team, merge into one and leave any signs of egoistic behavior behind.

programme.title: Game Shakers
programme.desc: Game Shakers revolves around two seventh graders, Babe and Kenzie, who live and go to school in Brooklyn, New York. Once they create a video game called "Sky Whale" as part of their school science project. The two friends have no idea that their game will become very popular and make a fortune. Everything goes smoothly until famous rapper Double G wants to sue them for illegal use of his song in the game. The girls decide to make an offer he can't refuse- business partnership, they also offer his son Triple G to become a video game consultant.

programme.title: SpongeBob Squarepants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea spong Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: SpongeBob Squarepants

Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents
programme.desc: The Fairly OddParents tells about the ten year old boy Timmy that lives in the fictional town Dimmsdale where he has a hard time. His life is constantly miserable because his parents are rarely home, he is babysat by Vicky, a 16-year-old torturous babysitter, he is bullied daily, and is tormented by his teacher, Mr. Crocker. But everything changes when he receives two fairy godparents: Cosmo, his wife Wanda, and later their son, Poof. Timmy learns that his fairy godparents are capable of granting him any wish he wants within certain limits. However, Timmy's immature nature causes him to sometimes ask for wishes that unintentionally result in disaster.

programme.title: 44 Cats
programme.desc: 44 Cats is an Italian preschool animated television series about four kittens who create a musical group called the Buffycats. Lampo is the lead singer and guitarist, Milady is the bassist, Pilou is the drummer and Meatball is the keyboard player. The kittens live in the house of Granny Pina where they meet 40 other cats. Granny likes to cook her magic pasta that gives the Buffycats their special powers. Her old garage is turned into a club, where the kittens give concerts and polish up their musical talents. They are always enthusiastic and optimistic, ready to give a helping hand to other cats and kittens. The 44 Cats is inspired by a very popular Italian kids song, 44 Cats which became famous on children's song festival Zecchino d'Oro in 1968.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You
programme.desc: In Blue's Clues & You, beloved puppy Blue invites viewers to join her and Josh on a clue-led adventure to solve a puzzle. With each paw print, the viewer is inspired to interact with Josh and Blue to figure out Blue's Clues!

programme.title: Butterbean's Cafe
programme.desc: The owner of Butterbean's Cafe in the magical land of Puddlebrook is fairy Butterbean. Her cafe is a very comfortable and warm place, popular for its various dishes- cakes, pancakes, cookies, banana bread, salads cooked by herself, her friends Poppy, Dazzle, Jasper and her sister Poppy. Friends use extraordinary cooking appliances and a magic secret ingredient, that is why everything is so special and yummy. Their jealous rival is Ms. Marmalady, things are not going great at her cafe so she desperately wants to put Butterbean out of business. But true friendship and friends' support can conquer evil.

programme.title: Barbapapa – One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: The barbababies discover a strange cave. Barbalib tells the story of the caves Barbapapa and how they transformed. The Barbababies have a sleepover in the living room. Fearing the monsters in the closet, they set up wacky traps to catch them.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington
programme.desc: The Adventures of Paddington is a new version of a familiar bear. It's a heartwarming show about being curious, being good to others, and being part of a loving family. Each 11 minute episode will take a lead from Michael Bond's original books and, with the spirit of the new Paddington movies, tell brand new Paddington stories in an exciting new animated form. The show will appeal to both children and adults alike – adults will recognise the Paddington they know and love, and young children will discover him for the first time. The show is heavily influenced by the Paddington Feature Films but a key difference is the characters especially the Brown family have been aged down, more of a young family starting out than the comfortable middle aged ones we see in the films.

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: PAW Patrol is a preschool series starring a pack of six heroic puppies: Chase, Marshall, Rocky, Zuma, Rubble, and Skye, who are led by a tech-savvy 10-year-old boy named Ryder. With a unique blend of problem-solving skills, cool vehicles and lots of cute doggy humor, the PAW Patrol works together on high-stakes rescue missions to protect the Adventure Bay community.From Marshall the firedog to Chase the police pup to Skye, who flies high in her copter, each pup brings unique personality and skill to the team, modeling the importance of teamwork and good citizenship. They all have special Pup Packs on their backs to help them handle anything – from rescuing kittens to saving a train from a rockslide! And no matter how big the adventure, the PAW Patrol always has time for a game, a laugh, and an ear scratch from Ryder.Fun PAW Patrol Fact: Ryder rescued all the pups and taught them their PAW Patrol skills.

programme.title: 44 Cats
programme.desc: 44 Cats is an Italian preschool animated television series about four kittens who create a musical group called the Buffycats. Lampo is the lead singer and guitarist, Milady is the bassist, Pilou is the drummer and Meatball is the keyboard player. The kittens live in the house of Granny Pina where they meet 40 other cats. Granny likes to cook her magic pasta that gives the Buffycats their special powers. Her old garage is turned into a club, where the kittens give concerts and polish up their musical talents. They are always enthusiastic and optimistic, ready to give a helping hand to other cats and kittens. The 44 Cats is inspired by a very popular Italian kids song, 44 Cats which became famous on children's song festival Zecchino d'Oro in 1968.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! And The Chipmunks
programme.desc: The series is an animated comedy about a single father named David Seville, who is raising three chipmunks. He can lose his patience sometimes, causing him to say ALVINNN!!! . The series takes place in modern times and discusses modern topics such as Dave's technology issues and school bullying. Others are parents embarrassing kids and parents needing dates.

programme.title: It's Pony
programme.desc: When pets are banned from the building, Annie and Pony have to convince the landlord to reconsider. When the dog from next door, Pony's sworn enemy, comes to stay with them, Annie needs to find a way to make them get along.

programme.title: It's Pony
programme.desc: A normal girl's life is made extraordinary by her best friend – an unpredictable, outrageous, and hilarious talking pony. No matter the complications he causes, Annie knows that everything is better when Pony is around.

programme.title: City Adventures
programme.desc: Welcome to LEGO City. A modern metropolis filled with the fiercest firefighters, the cream of the crop cops, and so many BLOCKHEADS. Every citizen will assemble together for the most awesomely awesome adventures.

programme.title: SpongeBob Squarepants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea spong Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: In this crowded and chaotic household, Lincoln Loud is the only boy among his ten sisters. With eleven children under one roof, things get a little bit crazy sometimes, to say the least. This children's cartoon is fun and light-hearted, and Clyde, Lincoln's best friend, only adds to that. Clyde is an only child by contrast, and is jealous of Lincoln's abundance of siblings. Clyde also has a massive crush on Lori, who is Lincoln's oldest sister. However, she has a boyfriend, Bobby. Bobby, although not being particularly intelligent, has several different jobs, ranging from life guard, to security at a shopping centre.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Phoebe and Max Thunderman are 14-year-old twins who share a house, a school, a birthday, and a set of superpowers courtesy of their super-powered parents. Yet somehow, in the cosmic game of genetic roulette, Phoebe popped out of the womb good, while Max came out evil. This super-sibling rivalry, coupled with the typical school/family issues faced by your average kid ultimately leads to a series of hilarious situations.

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Phoebe and Max Thunderman are 14-year-old twins who share a house, a school, a birthday, and a set of superpowers courtesy of their super-powered parents. Yet somehow, in the cosmic game of genetic roulette, Phoebe popped out of the womb good, while Max came out evil. This super-sibling rivalry, coupled with the typical school/family issues faced by your average kid ultimately leads to a series of hilarious situations.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Young Dylan
programme.desc: Hilarious television series, created by Tyler Perry, that follows the life and adventures of a street-smart kid and aspiring hip-hop artist Young Dylan. When Dylan's grandmother Viola realizes that raising her grandson is too much to take on, she decides to send him to live indefinitely with her wealthy son Myles Wilson, his wife Yasmine and their two kids Rebecca and Charlie. Everyone will have to adapt to their ''new normal'', and they will get themselves in lots of hilarious situations along the way. Dylan will teach his cousins about ''swag'' and street smarts, but he will soon learn that even rappers have rules in the Wilson house.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Young Dylan
programme.desc: Young Dylan's grandmother decides to send him to live indefinitely with her affluent son's family. The Wilson family household is soon turned upside down as lifestyles clash between aspiring hip hop star and his straight-laced cousins.

programme.title: Nicky, Ricky, Dicky & Dawn
programme.desc: Everyone with siblings knows that sibling rivalry is a real thing, so imagine the sibling rivalry between quadruplets. That's everyday life for the Harper quadruplets Nicky, Ricky, Dicky and Dawn.Whilst you might assume they get on well, these four siblings have absolutely nothing in common which normally leads to family fights. Although everyday life can be tough they have to learn to work together to solve the endless problems that they find themselves facing. Produced by Nickelodeon this lighthearted American comedy series is sure to have you fits of giggles.

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Entertaining comedy series that follows the out-of-this-world adventures of the Thundermans, a family that has superpowers but try to live normal lives in the town of Hiddenville. The parents, Hank and Barb, used to be "Thunder Man" and "Electress", until they decided to retire and move to suburbs, in an attempt to live a normal life with their kids- ''Thunder Twins'' Phoebe, whose superpowers include telekinesis, heat breath and freeze breath and Max, who has the same powers but wants to become a super-villain, Billy who is super fast, Nora, who has laser eyes and Chloe, whose superpower is teleportation.

programme.desc: Lana wants to win a race car ride-along with her hero, so she and Lincoln enter to compete in a soap box derby. When Luan must enroll in a culinary class, Dad uses it to share his passion for cooking with one of his kids.

programme.title: Aktuāli šodien un rīt
programme.desc: 5.epizode. Mazie un vidējie uzņēmumi – kāda ir to nākotne Latvijā? Raidījuma vadītāja Anda Pēkšēna, kurai ir 20 gadu vadības pieredze uzņēmējdarbībā, kopā ar dažādu nozaru ekspertiem un prasmju treneriem sniegs skaidru redzējumu mazo un vidējo uzņēmumu vadītājiem: kā saglabāt biznesu šodien, kā pastāvēt rīt, kā šodien ir jāmaina komunikācijas veids ar patērētāju, kā vadīt komandu, esošās izmaiņas nodokļu segmentā un citi svarīgi jautājumi, kas ir nozīmīgi ikvienam uzņēmējam.

programme.desc: Par darbīgiem ļaudīm un paliekošām vērtībām

programme.title: Uzrausim danci Valkā
programme.desc: Par godu 19.Latvijas tautas mūzikas svētkiem, 2016.gadā Valkas brīvdabas estrādē izskanēja dalībnieku dižkoncerts "Uzrausim danci Valkā". Koncertā uzstājās deju grupa "Dzirnas", Valkas ģimnāzijas jauniešu deju kolektīvs "Vendīgs" un Smiltenes Bērnu un jauniešu izglītības centra deju kolektīvs "Dadzīši". Uz skatuves kāpa arī pazīstamākās tautas mūzikas grupas. Koncerta pamattēma bija ceļojums cauri gadsimtiem mūsdienu muzeja noslēpumainās kolekcijās. Svētku radošā komanda ir instrumentālās tautas mūzikas eksperts Ilmārs Pumpurs, horeogrāfi Agris Daņilevičs un Dagmāra Leja, deju kolektīvu vadītājas Māra Leja un Vineta Skutāne, kā arī režisors Aivars Ikšelis un scenogrāfs Ivars Noviks.

programme.title: Izšķirtspēja
programme.desc: 15.epizode. Dermatalogs Raimonds Karls

programme.title: Pielaiko Cēsis
programme.desc: Cēsīs – pilsētā ar gadsimtiem senu vēsturi – bez pils, baznīcas un vecpilsētas ir vēl daudz interesantu vietu. 8 raidījumu ciklā ""Pielaiko Cēsis"" meklēsim vēstures pēdu nospiedumus, atklāsim unikālo un skatīsim vietas pašu cēsnieku acīm

programme.title: Aktuāli šodien un rīt
programme.desc: 5.epizode. Mazie un vidējie uzņēmumi – kāda ir to nākotne Latvijā? Raidījuma vadītāja Anda Pēkšēna, kurai ir 20 gadu vadības pieredze uzņēmējdarbībā, kopā ar dažādu nozaru ekspertiem un prasmju treneriem sniegs skaidru redzējumu mazo un vidējo uzņēmumu vadītājiem: kā saglabāt biznesu šodien, kā pastāvēt rīt, kā šodien ir jāmaina komunikācijas veids ar patērētāju, kā vadīt komandu, esošās izmaiņas nodokļu segmentā un citi svarīgi jautājumi, kas ir nozīmīgi ikvienam uzņēmējam.

programme.title: Makšķerēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Raidījumu arhīvu meklē www.retv.lv.

programme.title: Pipars cepās
programme.desc: 10.epizode. Grila sezona uzņem apgriezienus un aizvien vairāk cilvēku plāno nedēļas nogalēs pagatavot ko īpašu. Kas gan var būt kārdinošāks par grilēta ēdiena smaržu, kas virmo gaisā? Ikdienišķa maltīte kļūs par svētkiem, ja to pārvērtīsiet kopīgā grilēšanas pasākumā dārzā, piemājas terasē vai pie dabas krūts.

programme.title: Nida – ciems Latvijā
programme.desc: Kā laikam līdzi dzīvojuši ciema iedzīvotāji un kādas grūtības ciems piedzīvojis.

programme.title: Tā dzīvojam
programme.desc: Jānis Rokjānis

programme.title: Mana vide
programme.desc: ManaVide modernā, saistošā veidā aktualizē sabiedrībā vides jautājumus. Bioloģiskās daudzveidības saglabāšana – ko tas nozīmē manā ikdienā? Savu dalību jau apstiprināja eksperi, kuri pašreiz īsteno ES LIFE programmas projektu LIFE Cohabit.

programme.title: Nedēļa Latvijā
programme.desc: Par aizvadītās nedēļas svarīgākajiem notikumiem Latvijas novados.

programme.title: Rīgas festivāls
programme.desc: Šogad 80 gadi apritēja Imantam Kalniņam, vienam no latviešu mīlētākajiem skaņražiem. Latvijas Radio koris Sigvarda Kļavas vadībā komponista jubilejā veikuši koncertierakstu ar Imanta Kalniņa mūzikas stāstiem, izdziedātus cauri dzejniekiem. Skanēs dziesmas, kas tapušas ar Jāņa Poruka, Ojāra Vācieša, Māra Čaklā un Broņislavas Martuževas dzeju. Dzejnieki atšķirīgos Kalniņa daiļrades posmos kalpojuši par māksliniecisku impulsu, iekšēju pasūtījumu, lai taptu paša komponista mūzika. Tiekšanās pēc skaistuma, mīlestība, dumpinieciskums, filozofiska vertikāle, poētiskas ilgas sasaista dzejas pasauli ar kalniņisko garu. Koncertā būs dzirdami paša Imanta Kalniņa ierunātie teksti par šiem dzejniekiem.

programme.title: Документальный проект
programme.desc: Свет одновременно материален и нематериален. Вечность – главная особенность света. Фотонам не свойственно стареть. Свет от далеких звезд идет до Земли миллионы лет и приходит неизменным. Человек видит окружающие предметы исключительно благодаря фотонам. Проведенные исследования породили еще одну версию возникновение мира, согласно которой мир создан из света и может быть вновь обращен в свет. Об этом и многом другом расскажет Документальный проект.

programme.title: Улетное видео по-русски
programme.desc: Улетное видео по-русски – это сборник самых смешных и невероятных видео со всей планеты. В каждом выпуске представлены смешные падения людей, а также глупые поступки и нелепые ситуации в которые они попадают. Все серии улетного видео также не обошлись без обаятельных и неповторимых животных. Лучшее видео с любимыми котиками, смешным собаками и сотнями представителей дикой и домашней фауны, также собраны в одной передаче. Если смотреть улетное видео по-русски, то можно смело забыть о плохом настроении, ведь герои передачи заставят рассмеяться даже самого грустного зрителя. Все серии шоу пропитаны искрометным юмором, смешными шутками и невероятными кадрами. Помимо этого в шоу собраны редкие записи природных катаклизмов, сумасшедших везений и еще много-много все.

programme.title: Euronews
programme.desc: Свежие репортажи из разных уголков Европы помогут зрителям Первого канала ориентироваться в водовороте бурной европейской жизни

programme.title: Реальная мистика
programme.desc: Огромному количеству людей приходилось сталкиваться с проявлением необъяснимого и сверхъестественного, однако в большинстве случаев найти рациональный ответ на произошедшую ситуацию не удавалось никому. Докудрама "Реальная мистика" ставит перед собой амбициозную задачу: разгадать, на первый взгляд, абсолютно загадочные и мистические явления. Герои "Реальной мистики" – простые зрители, столкнувшиеся с необъяснимым в своей жизни. Ведущий документального реалити актер Андрей Дебрин вместе с командой помощников будет проводить расследование самых запутанных историй, которые происходят в мире: НЛО, гадания, привороты, аномальные зоны и многим другим и выяснят, что на самом деле за ними стоит.

programme.title: Разрушители легенд
programme.desc: Каждый из выпусков "Разрушители легенд" посвящён двум и более городским легендам, распространённым убеждениям или слухам из интернета. Основной миф часто требует всесторонней подготовки и специального полигона для испытания; кроме него в передачу также включают один-два не столь хлопотных в плане подготовки и проведения мифа. Некоторые эксперименты оказываются настолько сложными, что им посвящается весь час, отведённый на передачу. Иногда для проверки целого комплекса связанных мифов выпуск длится вдвое дольше обычного. Ведущие Джейми Хайнеман и Адам Сэвидж больше 30 лет работали в сфере кинопроизводства (в области спецэффектов) Они были главными техниками в Звёздных войнах (например, программировали движения дроидов). Впоследствии они стали использовать свои обширные инженерные знания и богатый опыт конструирования для создания сложных механических устройств, используемых в проведении экспериментов. Они разрабатывают, собирают и используют эти механизмы в мастерской спецэффектов M5 Industries Хайнемана. Часто испытания проходят и в других местах Сан-Франциско и его окрестностей, в том числе на бывшей военно-морской авиабазе в Аламиде, бывшей авиабазе ВВС "Хэмилтон" в Новато, на гражданском авиакосмическом полигоне "Мохаве Спейспорт", или в пустыне Мохаве, где проверяются мифы, связанные с ракетами.

programme.title: След
programme.desc: Действие сериала разворачивается в Москве вокруг новой экспериментальной лаборатории. Она оснащена по последнему слову техники, но есть всего шесть человек способных работать с новейшими технологическими разработками. Сотрудники лаборатории — это персонал Федеральной Экспертной Службы. ФЭС – это суперкоманда нашего времени, лучшие кадры всех областей криминалистики. Исследуя различные улики, генерируя версии, изобличая преступников, они помогают следствию в раскрытии реальных уголовных преступлений. Первостепенная задача ФЭС – найти то, что не смогут другие, их интерес – материальный мир места преступления. Миллиметр за миллиметром они исследуют каждую улику, ничто не останется незамеченным.

programme.title: Высокие ставки
programme.desc: В Санкт-Петербурге совершается покушение на известного криминального авторитета, владельца подпольной сети казино – Юрия Сергеева. В происходящее неожиданно вмешивается случайный прохожий, который дает киллеру отпор. Преступник убит, а прохожий, которым оказался тридцатилетний Кирилл Борзов, недавно приехавший в город из провинции, получает от Сергеева предложение работать в его службе безопасности. Так Борзов попадает в мир азарта и порока. Каждый день на глазах главного героя разыгрываются настоящие драмы из жизни игроков казино и его обслуги. Кто-то проигрывает целое состояние. Кто-то выигрывает крупную сумму, но не успевает ею распорядиться, как становится жертвой грабителей. Казино осаждают многочисленные аферисты, мошенники и проститутки. На казино то и дело наезжают "коллеги" авторитета Сергеева, стремясь отжать выгодный бизнес. В самом большом зале казино, расположенном в центре города, играют "сливки общества", высокопоставленные чиновники и крупные городские бандиты. Лучшие полицейские города бьются между собой за право крышевать это заведение…

programme.title: Дизель-шоу
programme.desc: Каждый выпуск "Дизель-шоу" – это час настоящего народного юмора в исполнении блестящих резидентов шоу. Среди участников "Дизель-шоу" талантливые актеры, известные КВНщики и самобытные шоумены. Вся команда, бесспорно, прекрасно чувствует друг друга, а потому так легко и непринужденно дарит хорошее настроение своим зрителям. Концерты Дизель-шоу давно уже стали желанным событием в каждом городе Украины, а поэтому билеты на такие мероприятия раскупаются мгновенно. Поэтому лучше купить билеты заранее.

programme.title: Дельта
programme.desc: Андрей Бекетов приехал в дельту Волги отдохнуть и навестить своего друга Павла Лобанова, работающего инспектором рыбоохраны. Когда-то они вместе служили в спецназе, потом Лобанов вернулся в родную деревню, а Бекетов ушел на работу в городскую полицию, но был оттуда уволен за излишнюю принципиальность…

programme.title: Звёзды и лисы
programme.desc: Нико Галицкий работает научным сотрудником в обычном НИИ, а его брат Сандро – известный рэпер. задерживает полиция. Следователь обвиняет его в убийстве постороннего человека, почему-то завещавшего братьям всё своё имущество. Братьям угрожает тюрьма, они должны во всем разобраться.

programme.title: Ziņu TOP
programme.desc: Raidījumā katru darba dienu tiek apkopotas svarīgākās dienas tēmas un komentētas kopā ar raidījuma vadītāju un dienas viesi.

programme.title: Dienas personība

programme.title: Vēlais ar Streipu
programme.desc: Ikdienas satīrisko ziņu vakara šovs ar Kārli Streipu, kurā tiek apskatītas un analizētas dažādas sabiedrībā aktuālas tēmas.

programme.title: Globuss
programme.desc: Raidījums "Globuss" reizi nedēļā skaidro ārpolitikas un starptautiskās aktualitātes, no kurām izriet arī Latvijas politiskā, ekonomiskā, tautsaimniecības un kultūras pozīcija un pārmaiņas.

programme.title: La Dolce Vita ar Roberto
programme.desc: Itālis Roberto Meloni kopā ar populāriem novadniekiem gatavo Latvijas novados iecienītākos ēdienus

programme.title: Globuss
programme.desc: Raidījums "Globuss" reizi nedēļā skaidro ārpolitikas un starptautiskās aktualitātes, no kurām izriet arī Latvijas politiskā, ekonomiskā, tautsaimniecības un kultūras pozīcija un pārmaiņas.

programme.title: Preses klubs
programme.desc: Diskusiju raidījums, kurā raidījuma vadītājs ar trim viesiem apspriež konkrētās dienas aktualitātes.

programme.title: Xploration Nature Knows Best
programme.desc: Hosted by marine biologist Danni Washington, this is a fascinating STEM series which focuses on the fun and inventive ways that scientists, engineers and inventors have taken inspiration from Mother Nature's methods in order to develop incredible advancements in their fields. By copying the ways that plants and animals have developed, the human innovators can utilise similar approaches to evolve modern technology for everyday use. From advances such as a new type of glass inspired by spider webs that will stop birds from crashing into it; to tiny robots based on manta rays that are helping to fight heart problems; and creating a new type of camera based on the study of squids.

programme.title: Deadly Nightmares of Nature
programme.desc: Naomi travels the world to find the worst nightmare of nature.

programme.title: The Big Feed
programme.desc: The Big Feed is an educational documentary that looks at all our favourite animals, studying the way that they eat. The show goes behind the scenes of the world's most famous zoos to explore how they perform the gargantuan task of feeding thousands of animals everyday. From big cats to aquatic animals, and panda bears to meerkats, each animal has to be carefully catered for, with consideration to their nutritional needs and taste preferences. The big feed is like trying to feed an entire city everyday.

programme.title: Dick 'N' Dom Go Wild
programme.desc: Dick and Dom get their hands on back-stage passes for willing helpers to get stuck in at Britain's busiest vets, wildlife sanctuaries and animal rescue centres. Their young volunteers are up for a massive challenge but they're not all big animal lovers. Will a day on the frontline looking after wounded wildlife and poorly pets change their minds?

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: Re-telling history in a way you never have before, Horrible History shows the dark and gruesome aspects of British and other Western world history. Ranging from the Stone Age to post-World War II era, the show presents the history with several time periods in a single episode, with live action sketches and music videos intercut by animations and quizzes. Starring Matthew Baynton, Simon Farnaby, Martha Howe-Douglas, Jim Howick, Laurence Rickard, Sarah Hadland and Ben Willbond with a large supporting cast, this British children's live-action historical and musical sketch comedy is based on the bestselling books of the same name by Terry Deary, adapted for CBBC. Running from 2009 to 2013, Horrible Histories doesn't set out to educate younger audiences but instead popularise history and inspire curiosity for further investigation into history.

programme.title: Andy's Safari Adventures
programme.desc: In one of the biggest safari parks in the whole world there is Ranger Andy, who will go off in his truest mobile- buggy to fix the problem. He is not alone with help from his Boss, Mr Hammond and Tech superstar Jen who know everything about computer. They are here to help all of the animal from the small and cute to the big and scary that you wouldn't normally get too close to. Everyday there is a new problem that need solving by Andy all around the whole world. Come a long on this epic journey of Adventure and learning about your favourite animal along the way.

programme.title: MathXplosion
programme.desc: Mathemagician' Eric Leclerc shares secrets from the not-so-hidden world of math in this exciting, entertaining math-short series, proving math really is everywhere! In each episode, Eric illuminates the big ideas in primary math that children are already learning to do. From computation, to patterns in a number sequence, to shapes and space, and measurement, mathXplosion highlights how math is related and connected to things they see, know, and wonder about in their daily lives. mathXplosion aims to grow and foster a love of math in a fun, funny, and approachable way!

programme.title: Blue Planet II
programme.desc: David Attenborough narrates this long awaited sequel to the first Blue Planet series. Returning to the oceans after nearly 2 decades, David Attenborough explores life under the seas, the day to day lives of the creatures that live there and the challenges they face from their rapidly changing environment which is affected more and more by humans every year. With a strong environmentalist message, the series promotes animal welfare and shows what the earth stands to lose if nothing is done about the current climate crisis. diving into every ocean on earth, a wide array of weird and wonderful animals are documented. Nature documentary series.

programme.title: Hero Squad
programme.desc: Six children are transformed into Hero Squad cadets and undergo a rigorous training programme alongside real life-savers. Under the watchful eye of presenter Rav Wilding and closely supervised by experienced mentors, these six wannabe heroes have the experience of a lifetime. In just 48 hours, the Hero Squad cadets have to learn the skills and techniques to cope with a "real life" rescue scenario.

programme.title: Ride or Wrong
programme.desc: Hosted by Emily Agard, Ride or Wrong is an adrenaline-filled series that gets your pulse pounding as teen contestants answer trivia questions while riding extreme amusement park rides. Each episode centres on one unsuspecting teen contestant who has no idea that they are about to be on a quiz show. Once the contestants are securely strapped in and the ride is twisting and turning at extreme speeds, our host poses a variety of trivia questions ranging from pop culture to science. Every correct answer earns our contestants points, which are added up at the end of each ride. Contestants must rely on their intelligence as well as their ability to focus under extreme conditions as they experience some of fastest and tallest rides the amusement park has to offer.

programme.title: Xploration Outer Space
programme.desc: Host Emily Calandrelli, MIT Engineer and astronautics expert takes viewers on incredible journeys through space. She visits various NASA facilities, private space companies, and interviews space experts in search of answers about our universe.

programme.title: All Over The Workplace
programme.desc: All Over The Workplace offers children a unique opportunity to explore what it is really like to do the jobs they dream about when they get older. Whether you want to join the police or write your first novel as an author, or cook sumptuous dishes as a chef, make people laugh as a comedian, wow the crowds as a footballer or even govern the country as a politician, this series sets out to discover just what it takes!

programme.title: Dick 'N' Dom Go Wild
programme.desc: Dick and Dom get their hands on back-stage passes for willing helpers to get stuck in at Britain's busiest vets, wildlife sanctuaries and animal rescue centres. Their young volunteers are up for a massive challenge but they're not all big animal lovers. Will a day on the frontline looking after wounded wildlife and poorly pets change their minds?

programme.title: Andy's Prehistoric Adventures
programme.desc: Time-travelling and educational fun for kids. Andy works at the National Museum where he's responsible for the prehistoric exhibitions. He needs plenty of interesting items for his displays like dinosaur bones, feathers and things. Luckily for Andy, he has a time machine which means he can pop back to the prehistoric era, like the ice-age or the time of the dinosaurs and collect what he needs. Join Andy on his adventures back in time and learn about the creatures and beasts that lived on Earth millions of years ago. Starring Andy Day.

programme.title: Xploration Nature Knows Best
programme.desc: Hosted by marine biologist Danni Washington, this is a fascinating STEM series which focuses on the fun and inventive ways that scientists, engineers and inventors have taken inspiration from Mother Nature's methods in order to develop incredible advancements in their fields. programme.title: Hey You! What If…
programme.desc: Hey You! What If...is a British children's series with a fun approach to get children interested in science. Each episode answers scientific questions, as the main character goes through impossible situations, with madcap experiments created by visual effects and motion graphics. Anything becomes real in this thought-provoking show, as possibilities of time travel, flat Earth and even a moon made of cheese are explored.

programme.title: MathXplosion
programme.desc: Mathemagician' Eric Leclerc shares secrets from the not-so-hidden world of math in this exciting, entertaining math-short series, proving math really is everywhere! In each episode, Eric illuminates the big ideas in primary math that children are already learning to do. From computation, to patterns in a number sequence, to shapes and space, and measurement, mathXplosion highlights how math is related and connected to things they see, know, and wonder about in their daily lives. mathXplosion aims to grow and foster a love of math in a fun, funny, and approachable way!

programme.title: Junior Bake Off
programme.desc: This is a version of the Great British Bake Off, except in this series, the contestants are all aged between nine and fifteen years. They will compete over 15 episodes, trying to make the best bread, biscuits, and cake, all manner of baked goods, in fact. At the end of the 15 weeks, one of the twenty original contestants will be crowned the winner. But who has got what it takes? Comedian Harry Hill presents, with Liam Charles and Prue Leith as the judges. Each week, there will be a technical test, followed by a "Showstopper" round, in which contestants are encouraged to get creative and create more individual bakes, with little guidelines. In the technical, however, they have to follow a recipe and produce bakes in a more uniform manner.

programme.title: Andy's Safari Adventures

programme.title: Danger! Wild Animals
programme.desc: Take a safari through the wilderness, visiting wildlife reserves, zoos and exotic locations that are home to some of the world's most interesting and dangerous species. Whether its an ostrich egg hatching or turtle being release into the wild, a rhino being weaned or an elephant being rescued from deadly minefields in Africa, this fast paced series uses some breathe taking footage. If that wasn't enough to capture your interest, it even takes a trip to some of the world's best breeding for conservation programs, encountering some adorable zoo babies.

programme.title: We're Talking Animals
programme.desc: We're Talking Animals is a children's television series that provides eye opening and jaw dropping facts about all kinds of wildlife and farm animals. Accompanied by some stunning photography and footage of the animals in question. With hilarious asides from the animals themselves, this animal knowledge is coming straight from the horses mouth. Solidifying everything the episode has taught, MC Spider hosts an informative quiz about each segment the show has covered, finding the answers deep in his trusty web. This interactive extra keeps the show super engaging and fun.

programme.title: Deadly Mission Madagascar
programme.desc: Eight British children leave the comfort of the homes to work alongside Madagascar's wildlife conservationists in this life-changing documentary series. Madagascar is a biodiversity hotspot, home to unique plants and animals that face an existential threat due to a growing human population and environmental changes. More than 90% of the island's wildlife is found only on Madagascar, and these eight young volunteers are here to help the passionate conservationists with protecting the remarkable native species. Narrated by Steve Backshall, follow the children as they learn about the incredible animals and extraordinary plants that are in danger of being lost from the planet.
